column16: Shot in head in locker room
column19: 16YOM student shot 18YOM student in the head in the locker room. Motive unknown.

column16: Victim had spanked shooter's granddaughter
column19: Janitor at the school (victim) had spanked the shooter's 8 year old granddaughter so she shot and killed him.

column16: Shooting outside school dance
column19: Unidentified juvenile student shot 4 other students outside of the school dance. Teachers were unaware of any conflict between the students. Police did not release a motive.

column16: Shot teacher multiple times in classroom
column19: Shooter walked into teacher's classroom with a rifle  fired multiple shots killing the teacher  fled the school  and was detained by the gym teacher. Shooter was a straight A student and had got a failing grade on the assignment by the teacher. Shooter was the son of President Johnson's press secretary.

column16: Shots deliberately fired a school bus
column19: School bus was deliberately shot while students were returning from trip to the zoo. 8 students were injured. No suspect was identified. No motive known. Multiple .22 and .30 caliber rounds struck the bus.

column16: Accidental shooting at school picnic
column19: 17 YOM fatally shot 18 YOM friend at school picnic. Determined to be an accident.

column16: Student shot self on stage at commencement
column19: Student walked onto stage during school commencement and shot himself with a .22 pistol. Graduation continued 20 minutes later. Student had no history of issues and was said to be "happy go lucky" by school officials.

column16: Shot principal after being paddled for truancy
column19: Shooter was paddled by the principal for disciplinary issues. Shooter went home  got a pistol  and returned to the school where he confronted the principal and fired 2 shots at him. Shooter fled the area and was later apprehended. Shooter had no previous criminal or disciplinary issues. No charges were filed.

column16: Shooter argued with victims in parking lot before getting gun from car and shooting them
column19: The shooter was a former student who had dropped out. The shooter got into a verbal dispute with the victims outside of the school building. The initial dispute ended and the shooter walked away from the victims. The shooter walked to his car  got a pistol  and returned to fire at the victims. The shooting may have stemmed from an ongoing dispute between the shooter and victims.

column16: Showing off gun in class when gun accidentally went off striking student
column19: 15YOM was showing off new .22 target pistol. Gun discharged in classroom striking a 16YOF.

column16: Armed robbery of school store
column19: Teacher shot/killed during attempted robbery at school store

column16: Shooter barricaded herself in house across the street and shot at random students
column19: Shooter lived across the street from the school and fired at random students and school staff waiting outside for the school to open. When police arrived  she shot an officer in the neck. Shooter than barricaded herself inside her house from multiple hours. Shooter said her motive was "she didn't like Mondays and wanted to liven things up". Shooter had previously been arrested for firing BB gun at the school building breaking windows. Shooter lived in poverty with father in a single bed house. Father was abusive alcoholic. Shooter had previous brain trauma and depression. Shooter was given the rifle for christmas (said she thought her father gave it to her so she could kill herself).

column16: Teacher came to aid of another teacher who was being robbed. Teacher was shot
column19: 4 youths robbed a teacher in the school parking lot at the end of the day. The teacher yelled for help. Another teacher  the victim came to the robbed teachers aid and began to struggle with one of the robbers when he was shot in the stomach. All suspects fled and were later arrested. Shooter charged as an adult.

column16: Attempted robbery and rape of teacher in classroom
column19: 39 year old female victim was shot in the stomach during an attempted robbery and rape in her classroom - suspect fled and later apprehended.

column16: Janitor shot student for throwing rocks at the school
column19: Three expelled students were throwing rocks at the school and broke multiple windows. The janitor confronted the students and fired 2 warning shots into the air. The students continued to approach him and he fired one shot into the ground near them. Some pellets struck one of the former students in the leg. Janitor was taken into custody.  Two other teens were arrested for damaging the school.

column2: Martin L. Mattei Junior High School
column16: Teacher shot in head by stray bullet fired from 3/4 mile away
column19: Gym teacher was shot in head while standing outside of the school with a group of students. Police believed the bullet may have been fired from 3/4 of a mile away. A youth was seen on a motorcycle with a shotgun.

column16: Ongoing dispute for months escalated into shooting
column19: 14YOM shot 13YOM in the back of the head outside of the school building. Two students had Ongoing dispute back to the prior football season. Both were on the football team. Shooter was found by police about 500 yards from the scene. Shooter and victim had showered together following sports practice moments before the shooting.

column16: Youths playing with gun when accidentally went off killing student
column19: Two boys were playing with a gun when it accidentally went off striking one of the boys in the head killing him. The shooter left the scene was was later found and questioned by police.

column16: Two students shot each other with same gun during fight
column19: Two students who had ongoing feud shot each other with same gun after a third student  who had previously been expelled  slipped the gun to one of the shooters through the chain link fence to avoid the schools metal detectors

column16: Racial Tension in Neighborhood
column19: Two white teens fired a rifle shot from a nearby rooftop striking a black football player during a football game. The shooting occurred during a period of racial tension within the neighborhood. Teens claimed the shooting was accidental and they were shooting at pigeons.

column16: Argument over stolen watch
column19: 16YOM shooter fired at 2 other students during an argument over a stolen watch.

column16: Student shot other student exiting school
column19: 18YOM student shot 14YOM student leaving the school.

column16: 14 year old student shot 11 year old girl in school hallway - unknown motive
column19: 11 year old victim was shot in the back by a random bullet from a .22 caliber handgun - shooter  a 14 year old boy was later stopped by police - he was carrying a gun in a western style holster. Taken into custody without incident.

column16: Three student gang members fired at rival gang members who fired back in cafeteria
column19: Two student gang members went into school cafeteria to shot rival student gang member. Targeted victim was armed and fired back at them. Bystander was struck. Other students reported the shooters were rival gang members. Shooters and victim/shooter all fled scene. 500 students were in the cafeteria at the time of the shooting.

column16: Fight during dispute over money resulted in shooting
column19: 16YOM shot by 14YOM in the stairwell of the school during a dispute over money.

column16: Student shot other student 3 times in class then walked to principals office and handed over gun
column19: 16YOM walked into class he was not enrolled for. Waiting in the back  then pulled out pistol and fired three times at 19 YOM student. Shooter put on a pair of sunglass and walked out of classroom. Showed no emotion during shooting. Walked to principals office and handed gun over to principal then started reading a magazine. School officials were not aware of any motive.

column16: Shooter shot self in chest in school library
column19: Student shot himself in chest after most students left library on the way to their morning class - reason of shooting not stated.

column16: Showing off gun in bathroom  pulled trigger to prove it was real
column19: 9YOM was showing off gun to 3 other students in the bathroom. Pointed at ceiling and pulled the trigger but it didn't fire. Pointed the gun at another student and pulled the trigger again. Second time it fired striking 9 YOM student in chest.

column16: Youth showing gun off at school - accidentally went off striking student
column19: 9 year old boy took gun to school and showed it off - other kids thought it was a toy gun - one pulled trigger and shot victim in cheek

column16: Robbery or a drug deal gone bad
column19: Victim was seen talking to suspects prior to shooting - Victim shot in stomach at close range - suspect fled - later caught.

column16: School teacher was shot be her husband outside school building
column19: Victim was shot by her husband after a domestic

column16: Unknown suspect targeted teacher shot after school
column19: An unknown bearded gunman with a "big gun" who shot and killed a Dallas schoolteacher as she stood with fellow teachers in a school lobby. A source close to the investigation said officers were seeking a man acquainted with Mrs. Pearson in the shooting. She said teachers told her the gunman came into the lobby and shot Mrs. Pearson  then fled. No one else was injured  Mrs. Toles said  and apparently the gunman said nothing before the shots were fired. The shooting occurred about "50-150 feet" from Mrs. Pearson's classroom. The bearded gunman walked into the school carrying "a big gun" and shot four times  striking the teacher in the leg  shoulder and abdomen. The man was described as about 30  5-foot-10  140 pounds  wearing a blue jacket and dark pants.

column16: Shot fired during fight in hallway between students with Ongoing dispute
column19: Fight in the hallway between 2 students escalated into a 16YOM shooting another 16YOM student in the chest. Shooter fled and was later arrested.

column16: Killed estranged wife (school employee) and school principal in their office
column19: 53YOM killed estranged wife (school employee) and principal in their office. Walked out of the school and surrendered to police.

column16: Student playing with gun in class accidentally shot self
column19: Accidental - student playing with gun in class - shot self in left arm

column16: Fired shotgun at football team during practice
column19: Shooter got out of car  fired shotgun at football team during practice. Drove short distance and fired another shot at the players on the field then drove away. Police said the shooting was related to gang activity.

column16: Shots fired during fight in parking lot
column19: Teacher in argument with three boys after school - shot in wrist - one juvenile apprehended - direct cause of argument not published

column16: Playing with gun during assembly  shot friend
column19: Students were passing around gun and playing with it during assembly. Student dared 18YOM to pull the trigger. He did unintentionally striking friend in head. Shooter was arrested and student who brought the gun turned himself in to police later.

column16: Ongoing fight between teachers
column19: A PE teacher and art got into an argument - they locked themselves in the gym office to talk - one teacher was shot/killed. the other teacher was taken to hospital for shock and later charged w/ murder

column16: Looking for ex-girlfriend  fired indiscriminately when he could not find her
column19: 19YOM non-student was looking for ex-girlfriend at the school. Fired a one student  then at a group of other students  and threatened a third group of students before fleeing and hiding in the woods nearby. Shooter had stolen a .22 rifle the night before.

column16: Student shot another student in the back after school  motive unknown
column19: 17YOM shot a 15YOM student in the back after school. Motive unknown.

column16: Shooter pulled out a .22 caliber pistol and wounded a fellow student in the art room then shot himself
column19: Argument over self portrait in art class. Shooter shot victim in face then ran out to hallway and shot himself.

column16: Occured in school parking lot - on going argument
column19: 17YOM student was shot in the parking lot by a 16YOM student during an argument. The two students had multiple conflicts in the past.

column16: Shot school counselor - held 30 hostages until surrendered to police
column19: Distraught boy brandished gun in study hall as school was beginning - shot counselor in stomach - shot into ceiling. held 30 students hostage for 30 minutes before surrendering to police.

column16: Coach was escorting 4 non-students out of school  one pulled a gun and fired striking a female student then the group fled
column19: Coach was escorting a group of non-students out of the school. One pulled a gun and fired at him but missed striking a female student. Group fled and shooter was arrested 7 hours later.

column16: 14-year old student walks into class before school and shoots teacher in hip
column19: 13 year old eighth grader shot science teacher in hip. Stated in police interview he didn't like teacher. No prior disciplinary problems. Other students present during shooting. No one else injured. Shooter had previously told other students he was going to shoot teacher.

column2: Francis M. Wood Senior High School
column16: Shooter and victim fought earlier  when challenged again  shooter pull gun and shot victim
column19: 17 year old shooter approached 20 year old victim and challenged him to a fight based on fight that allegedly occurred last summer between victim and shooter's friend. during the fight  shooter pulled out hand gun and shot at victim  but missed - shooter fled the scene.

column16: Gang shooting in outdoor courtyard
column19: Four suspects approached a 16YOM student and shot him in the courtyard of the school during lunch. Gang related.

column16: Shooter and victim get into argument on bus - shooter shoots victim once they arrive to school
column19: Shooter gets into argument with victim on school bus ride to school. Once at school   shooter shoots victim in back with .22 caliber pistol and flees scene - shooter later returns to school and gets ride home from parents.

column16: Ongoing conflicts with fellow students
column19: 15YOM shot 16YOM student during an argument in the hallway.

column16: Shot outside the school dance following an argument with suspects
column19: 19YOM was shot and killed outside of the school dance by two 18YOMs. Victim had a prior argument with the shooter.

column16: Shooter tried to talk victim out of testifying
column19: Shooter confronts victim in school bathroom in an effort to get him to not testify - victim shot - suspect fled and later caught.

column16: Victim shot by unknown assailant while standing next to school building
column19: Victim was shot in the leg while standing next to school building after softball game - unknown shooter - no information on whether shooter was caught.

column16: Vice Principal shoots teacher in language arts class before school
column19: 42 year old vice principal shoots 28 language arts teacher - his girlfriend - shoots 6 times - hits her three - later turns himself in - pleads not guilty by reason of insanity.

column16: 12 year old boy shot .22 caliber handgun into classroom wall then went outside and shot himself in stomach
column19: 12 year old boy accidentally shot classroom wall while playing with .22 caliber handgun. After the accidental discharge  student went outside school building followed by teacher. When teacher told him to drop gun  student shot himself in stomach. He then told teacher it was an accident. Fellow students saw shooter with gun earlier in day but thought it was fake.

column16: Fight between rival gang members on basketball court  2 bystanders stuck
column19: Fight between two groups of rival gang members at the school. 3 youths injured  one was gang member  2 were bystanders playing basketball.

column16: 2 student shot outside of school  shooter fled
column19: Victims shot outside school - shooter fled and was arrested off campus at a body shop - no reason for shooting given.

column16: Shot by officer  situation unclear  may have been vandalizing school
column19: Shot by officer outside the school. Situation unclear. May have been involved with breaking school windows with 2 other unknown males.

column16: Students arguing over $1 gambling debt
column19: Student shot by other student over gambling debt. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested.

column16: Attempted robbery - shot for gold ring
column19: 18YOM student shot outside of school during robbery. No other details.

column16: Shooting followed two day argument over a girl
column19: Shooter shot victim during early morning hours in school hallway - claimed shooting stemmed from ongoing argument over a girl who began dating victim. Shooter stated he shot at victim 5-6 times after victim approached him with knife - no knife found on victim

column16: Fight between a group of students - victim was bystander
column19: Bystander student was shot during an attempted robbery of a coat outside of the school.

column16: Robbery of teacher who was collecting money outside HS basketball game
column19: Teacher was collecting ticket money outside HS basketball game when shooter came in to do robbery. Victim flipped table he was sitting at over and was then shot - man sitting next to victim gave shooter money - shooter then fled - victim later died

column16: Shooter was showing off gun in class and accidentally shot victim
column19: Shooter was showing off gun and accidentally shot victim -

column16: Escalating argument between students - they shot each other
column19: Two students got into an argument in the hallway - apparently they both had guns and shot each other at the same time. One student died  the other was shot in the arm

column16: Shooter pulled gun in English class - teachers police tried to talk him out of it - later shot self in bathroom
column19: 14 year old shooter pulled out .38 caliber pistol around 8:30 am during English class - teachers were able to evacuate students and get shooter into a conference room where they and police tried to get him to surrender. Shooter later went into bathroom where he eventually shot/killed himself - reason for suicide was not known

column16: Student carrying bible  pulled out gun during lunch and shot self in stomach
column19: Student carrying bible pulled small caliber gun from bag during lunch and shot self in stomach - believed to be intentional as shooter gave away his meal tickets prior to shooting.

column16: Thought teacher - victim - wanted him committed to mental hospital
column19: Told police he thought victim - his psychology teacher - wanted him committed to mental hospital. Shot teacher in the head  shot two other students  and the fled the scene.

column16: Two students were shooting prairie dogs  one suddenly turned the gun and fatally shot the other
column19: Was shooting prairie dogs with friends during lunch. while outside with friends  put gun to friends chest and pulled trigger.

column16: Youth intruder chased through school shoots teacher before escaping
column19: Teacher observed two youths enter school after it had recessed for the day - teacher gave chase - cornered youths in shop class. One youth escape  other youth shot teacher in foot before escaping - no suspects

column16: ROTC Student cleaning rifle presumed unloaded - accidental shooting of self
column19: ROTC Student cleaning rifle presumed unloaded - accidental shooting of self

column16: Shooting resulted from escalation of ongoing conflict in school parking lot
column19: Escalation of ongoing conflict - occurred in parking lot of school

column16: Two students shot by three males with high powered bb or pellet guns
column19: Two female students were standing outside school building when three males pulled up in a yellow truck and shot them using high powered Bb or pellet guns. Both girls were struck in the legs - treated at hospital and released. Suspects fled the scene - nothing further

column16: Held 9 students hostage for 21 hours
column19: Distraught dropout held 9 hostages for 21 hours while looking for ex-girlfriend. Fired while entering school and fired at police during standoff but there were no injuries. Fired shots at ex-girlfriend when she was brought by police to talk with shooter. Eventually surrendered peacefully.

column16: Student intentionally shot self in head during lunch
column19: 12 year old student shot self in head during lunch with .22 pistol while classmates watched

column16: Ongoing conflicts with fellow students
column19: Ongoing fight led to shooting

column16: Shooter showing gun to friends accidentally goes off striking two students
column19: Student showing off .22 pistol to friends - gun accidentally goes off  ricocheted off the wall and struck two students.

column16: Boyfriend came into girlfriend's algebra class  shot her with shotgun and killed self
column19: Teacher in classroom tried to talk suspect down  but he waved shotgun and told teacher and everyone else to leave that "this is between me and her " is ex-girlfriend. His mom knew he was upset about the breakup but didn't suspect he would kill anyone.

column16: Shooter took teacher hostage then shot self in head
column19: Student with known disturbance problems entered teacher's class demanding to talk with her - when she refused because she was teaching  he pulled small caliber gun from umbrella and pointed it at her. All students fled class. Teacher was held hostage until student shot self in head. Statements made that he was at risk for failing semester.  Pronounced dead later that evening

column16: Robbery for a jacket
column19: Victim was robbed of his fur trimmed jacket in hallway of school - Victim was approached by three men all carrying guns - suspects fled school after shooting

column16: Shooter killed wife and shot self in counselor's office
column19: Shooter shoots wife three times then shoots self while in counselor's office. Wife dies - shooter lives but in critical condition - later dies - father confirmed they were having marital problems and asked school officials to keep them apart.

column16: Previous fight with victim; brother was bullied by victims
column19: Police found suicide note  knife  and 100 rounds of ammo inside duffle bag suspect brought guns into school with. Statement made that suspect was angry at two victims for disparaging remarks made about brother.

column16: Shooter checked safety on gun in class and accidentally shot self
column19: 14 year old checked safety on gun while in class and shot himself in the thigh. Shooter had previously received the gun from another student.

column16: Two students were playing basketball at school on Sunday - get in argument - shooter kills victim
column19: Argument ensued during Sunday pickup game of basketball - shooter goes home  gets gun and comes back and kills 16 year old victim.

column16: Suicidal due to known drug problem
column19: Apparent suicide attempt - student was known to have drug problems and school was providing her counseling. Student shot self in bathroom and then collapsed in hallway.

column16: Shooter on school bus showing off gun when he accidentally shot self
column19: Shooter was on bus when he accidentally shot himself in the leg and hand while showing off gun. Had taken the gun to school to try and sell for a friend.

column16: Victim shot by unknown assailant while on football field
column19: Victim shot in buttocks while walking on football field with friend - suspect shot girl through fence - suspect not found.

column16: Shot at teacher in class and missed  angry about discipline
column19: 11YOM student was angry with teacher about discipline. While she was taking attendance  he fired a .38 revolver at her and missed. Ran out of classroom and fired a second shot that also missed. Surrendered to janitor and principal. Pistol was taken from the closet at home.

column16: Victim accidentally shot after stepping between two quarreling teens in school basement restroom
column19: Victim observed to men arguing in school basement - went to break them up and was accidentally shot in stomach - suspect fled the scene. Police said the shooter was not a student.

column16: Shot and killed cafeteria worker during robbery
column19: Shooter robbed school cafeteria while staff member was counting the money. Shot and killed 61 year old female cafeteria worker during robbery. Fled the scene and was later arrested.

column16: Shooter was former teacher  came back to school  took class hostage  shot victim then self.
column19: Suspect was a substitute teacher who got in physical altercation with one of victims. Suspect was released from his job - sought revenge and came back to school - took a classroom full of hostages and shot victim who was in class. All hostages were later released and suspect killed himself - he was known to make threats to officials including Reagan Cabinet members.

column16: Shooter confronted victim about a girl  fight ensued  victim shot.
column19: Two non-students entered school and confronted victim - possibly over a girl - two men began fighting with victim. Victim  who was school wrestler was winning fight - coaches saw fight and broke up. One shooter then pulled pistol and shot victim - shooter and other man fled scene - later caught.

column16: Ongoing conflict over a girl ended with victim shot
column19: Shooting escalated from weekend fight - occurred outside of school - shot three times in alley north side of school. After shooting victim went inside school and collapsed

column16: Accidentally shot self during game of Russian Roulette
column19: Playing russian roulette. Shooter brough family car into auto body class to work on. Pulled out .22 revolver from underneath seat and put to head pulled trigger. Gun didn't fire - gave to friend to do  who declined. Shooter took gun back  put to head and pulled trigger again - gun fired killing him

column16: Fight outside on school grounds turned into shooting.
column19: Suspect and victim involved in fight outside school - victim grabs suspect in bearhug  suspect grabs pistol  turns around and shoots victim  victim runs into school and dies in hallway. Suspect being sought.

column16: Gang fight stemming from weekend fight
column19: Rival gang fight first day of school - escalated from weekend fight - all victims were innocent bystanders. At least 6 gang members were involved. 2 guns were recovered.

column16: Student accidentally shot self in leg while in class
column19: Shooter had small caliber pistol in backpack - accidentally shot himself in leg during class - yelled out "I shot myself" then yelled out "someone shot me - student ran to bathroom then came back to class - school admin treated his wound in class - was later charged

column16: Shooter walked into class room and shot victim 4 times over a girl
column19: Shooter walked into class room and shot victim 4 times - shooting stemmed from students involved in earlier argument possibly over a girl. Student fled - later found at friends house.

column16: Ongoing conflict for multiple days with victims
column19: 20YOM former student shot 3 other students during a football game. Shooter and victim had been in Ongoing conflict for multiple days prior to the shooting. 10000 people were at the game during the time of the shooting.

column16: Victim hit in cross fire of gang shooting
column19: 16YOF student hit in crossfire of gang related shooting.

column16: Victim purposely shot with starter pistol outside school dance.
column19: Shooter was with a group of men who had shown up late to a dance and were not allowed in. Victim was in that group. Victim pulled out a starter pistol and fired several shots into the air. Shooter then shot victim in back of head - shooter fled and was later caught.

column16: Shooter killed victim with gun after being punched
column19: 17 year old student sneaked a.38 caliber gun belonging to father passed school guards and shot/killed victim after being punched.

column16: Shooter shot rival gang members during argument over a girl's sweater
column19: Argument of sweater girl was wearing - rival gangs involved. Older boys began picking on shooter (from rival gang) - shooter stepped back  pulled out revolver and shot several times. Later arrested at friend's home.

column16: Robbery of Georgetown jacket in school hallway
column19: Victim was walking with friends in second floor hallway when shooter came up behind him and demanded his jacket - as victim was taking jacket off suspect shot him in neck.

column16: Shooter shot victim while in cafeteria taking test.
column19: Victim and shooter were arguing over a girl in school - teacher broke up the fight and students went their separate ways. Victim was taking test in cafeteria when suspect walked up and shot him 3 times - fled scene - found in corn field

column16: Suspect shot German teacher due to previously being disciplined by her.
column19: Suspect shot German teacher in neck during class due to prior disciplinary incident. Suspect had previously bragged to other students about shooting but no one took him seriously. On day of shooting suspect came to school in "gangsta hat" trench coat and undershirt - student was looking for attention.

column16: Victim argued with 4 other youths on parking lot before being shot
column19: Victim was arguing with four other subjects on school parking lot when one of the subjects pulled at gun and shot victim. Victim would not cooperate with police on identifying shooter

column16: Argument in school hallway led to victim being shot
column19: Ongoing conflict between students

column16: Shooter shot teacher twice during lunch
column19: Shooter shot teacher in teacher's classroom during lunch  period - shooter had previously failed teacher's class and was angry. Defense council stated shooter was stressed over family's expectations he achieve higher.

column16: Shot multiple students from house across the street during mental breakdown
column19: Lived across the street from school - shot at kids on playground from the second story window of his house. He had previously lost 4 sisters  both parents and a brother in a mass murder/suicide in Jonestown Guyana in 1978. girlfriend said he suffered a mental breakdown after this loss.

column16: Ongoing conflicts with fellow students
column19: Ongoing escalation of conflict between two students - shooting occurred in crowded auditorium

column16: Accidental while showing off gun
column19: 8th grade student brought gun to school  friend was looking at it and accidentally fired striking victim in head.

column16: Suicide attempt in front of classroom
column19: Student stood up in front of his fifth grade class  declared no one loved him then shot himself

column16: Student shot self in chest in school parking lot
column19: Senior shot himself in the chest with a .22 caliber rifle while sitting in his car in school parking lot -

column16: Shot girlfriend and then self after break-up
column19: Shooter had been stalking victim. Shot her multiple times in classroom and then shot himself. Bought gun from a friend - parents had no idea he had a weapon

column16: Anger over suspension / fight with girlfriend
column19: Shooter walked into his girlfriend's typing class  shot at the teacher (no injury) shot his girlfriend (who survived) then shot/killed himself. Shooter was angry over his recent suspension for harassment / fighting with his girlfriend. Was allowed to come back to school after promising school staff he wouldn't fight with her anymore. Had suicide note in pocket.

column16: Shooter was trying to settle argument  tackled by students
column19: 17YOM student had dispute with with a female and male student the day prior. Brought shotgun to settle the dispute. Other students saw him with the gun and tackled the shooter. Shotgun was loaded with light birdshot.

column16: Shooter dropped bag with gun inside. Gun went off striking victim
column19: Victim was accidentally shot in the chest by shooter who had gun in bag. Gun went off when shooter dropped his bag on his desk during Spanish class

column16: MIstaken identity related to gang violence
column19: Victim was walking outside on school grounds when he was shot in the arm by a male chasing a group of boys. Police suspect it was gang related and the victim was an innocent bystander.

column16: Shooting occurred after football game between gang members and students
column19: Several students and gang members got into a fight after a high school football game. The victim was an innocent bystander who was shot with a .22 pistol in the stomach - no suspect information known

column16: Heavily armed former student fired 30 shots in the school's foyer then surrendered to principal
column19: Shooter was former student who walked into school with Uzi  AR-15  and pistol looking for english teacher. The teacher's classroom had moved since he had attended. He walked around the school and was unable to find them. In the main foyer of the school  the shooter fired 30 rounds breaking windows and damaging the building. There were 12 students in the area  one had minor injuries. Principal confronted the shooter. He threw his weapons down while yelling "I did it" and sat quietly until police arrested him. Firearms details: 9mm Uzi  AR-15  .45 pistol.
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Unknown shooter shot 5 grader raising flag at school
column19: 5th grade student was shot by high powered rifle while raising flag outside schoolhouse - unknown shooter. approximately 15 minutes later a seventh grade boys was shot at while walking to his junior high school - about 5 miles away from first shooting - no suspect

column16: Victim shot with pellet gun while practicing with drill team on high school field
column19: Victim was practicing with her drill team on the high school field when she was shot with a pellet gun by unknown shooter

column16: Victims accidentally shot while watching fight at school
column19: Two victims were watching fight at school  when one of the fighters pulled a gun and began shooting striking both victims - suspect later caught.

column16: Victim and shooter involved in fight  - gun falls from pants - accidental discharge - strikes victim in leg
column19: Shooter and victim were involved in a fight  when security officer tried to break up  gun fell from pants of shooter  hit foot of security guard and discharged striking victim in thigh

column16: Female shooter killed bus driver  fired multiple shots at the bus  and rammed the bus with her car multiple times as a result of a custody dispute
column19: Shooter (student's mother) had lost custody of child. While child was getting on the school bus  the mother attempted to get on the bus and take him. The bus driver tried to stop her and she shot the bus driver. The shooter's former brother-in-law jumped on the bus and started to drive it away. The shooter fired multiple shots breaking the windows. Father drove the bus to the police station. Shooter rammed the bus multiple times with her car but was unable to stop it. Shooter fled but later arrested after being stopped for drunk driving later. Shooter found not guilty due to insanity.

column16: Shooter at school to see girlfriend - was told to leave  detained  during fight with teachers he shot gun
column19: Shooter (non student) was at the school to see his girlfriend (student) - School staff told him to leave as no visitors allowed. He ran down hallway and was detained by school staff who call police. While waiting for police  shooter began to fight with teachers  pulled gun from pants and shot three times  one bullet hit teacher in groin. Another teacher injured his hand when he put it in between hammer of gun.

column16: Ongoing conflicts with fellow students

column19: 16YOM (victim) and 17YOM (shooter) had previous fight at apartment complex. Later at the school  the shooter ran into the victim in the main hallway of the school building and shot him. Shooter fled the scene.

column16: Group of Vietnamese students had Ongoing argument with group of white students
column19: Group of Vietnamese students had an Ongoing dispute with a group of white students. The group of Vietnamese students yelled slurs at a group of white students in the hallway  they misidentified the students they had the issue with and fired shot striking two uninvolved students.

column16: Caught trying to set fire to school
column19: Suspect (science teacher) shot assistant principal who caught him trying to set fire to several areas in school.

column16: Teenagers joyriding fired at two elementary school students on a school playground
column19: 15YOM and 16YOM male driving in vehicle fired shots for .22 handgun at playground striking two elementary school students. The shooters were later caught and said they were playing around. 16YO who fired was released to his father for punishment who branded him with a "2" to signify the two student he could have killed.

column16: Student shot during football game by unknown shooter who fled
column19: 15 year old student shot and killed during football game by unknown suspect.

column16: 5 gang members fired shots at a student  all shots missed.
column19: 5 gang members approached a student outside of the school and fired 3 shots during a confrontation.

column16: Gang related shooting involving large group of students
column19: Gang related - stemmed from previous fights in the past. Bystander student struck and killed.

column16: Bystander students shot during gang shooting outside of school
column19: A fight occurred outside of the school involving members from rival gangs. Three students were shot during the fight.

column16: Two teens shot during football game inside stadium  remainder of game cancelled.
column19: Two teens (not students of either school) were shot inside the stadium during a high school football game. Shooter was not identified. Police officers were assigned to the stadium and heard the shots. The game was stopped and the fans were told to leave the stadium

column16: Drive-by in school parking lot  vehicle had covered license plate
column19: Two women in a car drove up to a group of students and opened fire outside of the school. The injured student did not know the shooters.

column16: Armed student took teacher and 15 students hostage in classroom for 8 hours
column19: Good student and well liked. Suspended twice just prior to the shooting for breaking a window and pulling a fire alarm during pranks. Held 15 students and a teach hostage for 8 hours in a classroom. Said that he was upset about the suspension while holding students hostage. Other students were in disbelief that it was him and told police he would not hurt anyone. Father is a police officer.

column16: Mother of student shot principal for suspending son
column19: Shooter (parent of student) shot principal during an argument about the suspension of her son. Shooter claimed the principal had made a racial slur to her.

column16: 50 rounds fired in school parking lot outside of basketball game by gang members over a drug debt  no injuries
column19: Rival gang members fired 50 shots in the school parking lot over a dispute about a cocaine purchase. A basketball game was taking place in the school gym at the time of the shooting. 9 cars were damaged but no injuries occured.

column16: Student walked into class room  put .357 into mouth  and commit suicide
column19: Student walked into class and shot himself in the head with a .357. Student was depressed  loaner  and had poor attendance. Gave suicide note to another student prior to the shooting. Inspire the song "Jeremy" by Pearl Jam. Some news reports state the weapon was a .38 caliber. (last source cited).

column16: Large fight occurred between students from rival neighborhood. Shots fired by two students. One was injured.
column19: Large fight occured between 20-30 students outside of the school. Fight involved students who were bused in from another neighborhood. Shots were fired by two different unidentified shooters. One student was injured by a GSW.

column16: Non-student killed on student and injured another in the parking lot. Student killed had 2 grams of crack cocaine in his pocket
column19: Shooter had long criminal history and had fled juvenile custody. Shooter walked onto school property through broken fence to avoid 2 armed guards. Shooter walked up to a group of students and shot one in the head and injured another. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested. Victim had 2 grams of crack cocaine in his pocket packaged for sale.

column16: Targeted victim after fight the prior weekend
column19: Shooter was seeking revenge for fist fight he got into over the weekend with one of the victims. Shooter entered the school's gym around 9:45 am and shot the victim in the face  the bullet ricocheted and struck an innocent bystander. The shooter fled but was later caught and arrested. Charged with attempted murder and 2nd degree assault

column16: Following talent show  large fight broke out in school parking lot. 2 shooters fired during fight.
column19: Large fight broke out over a rap performance at the school talent show. Shots were fired by two shooters who fled the scene. Armed police officers were present before and during the incident.

column16: Drive By shooting at end of school day
column19: 21YOM shot in drive by at school while picking up younger sister. Shooting related to prior shooting between former students.

column16: Student commit suicide in school cafeteria after break-up with gf
column19: Shooter had just broken up with girlfriend and we upset. Attempted suicide 2 weeks prior. Took .22 pistol out of his book bag and put it to his head in the cafeteria with about 100 other students present. Student tried to stop him. Shooter pointed the gun at the other student and pulled the trigger but it misfired. Pointed the gun at his own head  pulled trigger second time  and was fatally shot.

column16: Gang-related shooting in school hallway
column19: A group of 10 youths affiliated with a gang tried to enter the school. When the security guard stopped them  they ran away and fired shots back at the guard. One of the shots hit another student in the head killing him. Two minors were arrested the next day but not identified.

column16: Accidental discharge playing with gun in classroom
column19: 16 year old teen accidentally shot his friend during class. Victim refused to testify against shooter.

column16: Shooter fired at group of students standing outside the school  previous conflict with the group
column19: While a choir concert was being held at the school  a group of teenagers were standing out front. The shooter approached them and fired multiple shots killing one victim.

column16: Gang-initiation shooting at school
column19: Gang initiation  - a 13 year old and two 15 year olds were charged with attempted murder

column2: Robert A. Millikan Junior High School
column16: Victim flashed gang signs at a male in a van outside of school  shooter fired multiple shots killing him
column19: Student outside of school flashed gang signs at the driver of a van. The van driver was a rival gang members and shot the student to death then drove away.

column16: Gang members shot a student outside of school
column19: Student was standing outside of school. Car pulled up and student walked over to talk with driver/passenger. Someone in the car pulled a gun and shot the student. Police said the shooting was gang related.

column16: Victim was beat and shot by two gang members in school
column19: Victim and friend were challenge by two gang members to a fight. Victim was shot in the leg during the fight.

column16: Shots fired during large fighter between rival football teams
column19: Large fight occurred in parking lot after football game between rival schools. 20 gunshots were fired by multiple shooters. Victim was fatally shot in the crossfire.

column16: Shooter fired crowd during basketball game in retaliation for previous gang shooting
column19: Shooter fired random shots at crowd in gym during basketball game in retaliation for prior gang shooting. One student was injured.

column16: Victim insulted shooter in cafeteria

column16: Accidental while showing off gun
column19: Shooter had purchased the handgun from a friend. He was showing it off on the school bus when it accidentally discharged hitting another student in the leg. Shooter fled the bus and threw the gun in the sewer.

column16: Shooting between 15-20 rival gang members at football game
column19: School officials had issues with fights and shooting at previous games. Game time was moved up to 3PM to avoid this. Large fight occured in 4th quarter with gunshots fired by multiple people. 2 students were injured.

column16: Shooting at football game between rival teams
column19: Shots fired during fight between fans of rival schools. Game had to be stopped. No injuries reported.

column16: Planned fight outside of school
column19: Victim challenge suspect to a fight - suspect left scene and came back with a gun  - shot and killed victim outside of high school.

column16: Targeted shooting of victim involved in prior fight
column19: Victim was involved in a fight with 4 other youths describes as a "street beef' when one of the attackers pulled a gun and shot victim in the back.

column16: Accidental. 13YO boy in woods nearby was shooting at squirrels  didn't realize how far bullets traveled.
column19: Victim was struck outside of school during recess by single .22 round. Boy nearby was shooting at squirrels. Didn't realize bullets would travel far enough to reach school.

column16: Shooter fired shots into the air while being harassed by two bullies. Fled scene after firing.
column19: Two students had bullied shooter. Shooter pulled out pistol and fired shots into the air then fled the scene. Shooter was arrested at a nearby apartment building.

column16: Shooter fired rifle shot which broke into pieces and injured two students; subdued by police after 15 minute standoff
column19: 16 year old drop out walked into his former school - shoots rifle  - bullet breaks into fragments and injured two students. 15 minute standoff ensues - police able to sneak in behind him and tackle

column16: Shooter younger brother was bullied. Shot bully during confrontation.
column19: Shooters younger brother was being bullied. Went to school to confront bullies and fired shot killing one during confrontation. Shooter fled the scene.

column2: Walter L. Cohen Senior High School
column16: Fight between 8 students escalated into shooting outside school
column19: Argument between 8 students turned into fight outside of school. Shooter in a vehicle fired multiple shots striking two students and killing one of them.

column16: Gang related shooting at group outside of high school
column19: Gang related shooting. Shooters opened fired on a group of students outside high school. Car then left scene  but came back and opened fired again. A student from another school who was at Ysleta was killed and another Ysleta student was wounded. 4 gang members charged with murder.
column27: Mutliple invoved - Adrian Ruiz  Victor Galvan  Christopher Enriquez  Abel Hernandez

column19: Victim shot in legs and feet by disturbed freshman outside of cafeteria. School security officers arrested the shooter immediately.

column16: Shots fired during fight in hallway
column19: Three shots were fired in the hallway during a dispute between students. Another student not involved in the dispute was struck and killed and a teacher was critically injured. Shooter fled the scene and was arrested at his home later that day. The shooting was an escalation of a long standing dispute between the shooter's brother and two other students.

column16: Two shot during basketball tournament outside of gym
column19: Shooter was outside of high school during basketball tournament. Approached two victims and fired multiple shots before fleeing.

column2: Francis W. Gregory Junior High School
column16: Shot during robbery behind school
column19: 14YOM shot behind the school during attempt to steal his jacket.

column2: Francis W. Gregory Junior High School
column16: Student shot in hallway during a fight with 3 other students

column16: Shot victim due to jealousy over a girl
column19: Suspect shoots victim - on going problems between the two - possibly over a girl

column16: Argument over coat stolen in prior burglary
column19: Two teenage students confronted a man outside the school wearing a coat that they believed was stolen in a prior burglary. The unknown male pulled out an automatic pistol and shot both of them.

column16: Shots fired during fight in hallway
column19: Shooter fired at two victims in the hallway of the high school during a dispute. Two police officers were approximately 15 feet away. Shooter ran from the scene and was arrested out. Shooter and victim had been arrested for previous armed robbery and only the shooter had been charged creating ongoing dispute. Shooter obtained the gun from a friend the morning of the shooting. This was the second shooting inside the school in 3 months and police officers were assigned to the school at the time of the shooting.

column16: Shot specific victim in school cafeteria
column19: 12YO shooter brought .22 pistol concealed in overalls. During argument with victim in school cafeteria  shooter fired one shot striking the victim in the head and fled the scene.

column16: Fight escalated into shooting in the hallways

column16: Shots fired during fight in school hallway

Once they meet to fight a few days later the shooter pulled out a small caliber pistol and shot the victim twice in the stomach. The shooter then fled  but was caught the next day and charged with attempted murder.

column16: Accidental  gun fired into air came down and struck 19YOM in head
column19: Party in the parking lot of the school. Students and former students were drinking and firing guns. Bullet fell and struck former student in the head.

column16: Planned attack  80 hostages

Shooter took 80 students hostage for 8 hours before surrendering to police. Shooter had been recently fired from an assembly line job and blamed the school and the teacher he killed for failing him out. Did not have high school diploma. Shooter had planned the attack  wore a camo vest with ammo belt  and had waited until he got his unemployment check to buy more ammo before the shooting. No mental health history.
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Ongoing fight  shooter told victim he was going to kill him tomorrow day prior

column16: Bullied - planned attacked - referred to himself as a "new Jack City Hustler."
column19: Suspect was previously picked on. During first period science class  suspect pulled out .357 and shot round striking one student in arm and hitting other student. column16: Drive-by  students/shooter yelled gang names
column19: Four unknown males in a vehicle opened fire on three students outside the school after gang names were yelled.

column16: Fight at school dance escalated into shooting
column19: Fight between 2 students occurred during school dance that escalated into shooting. Music was so loud that students did not know a shooting had happened. Victim walked across the street to call 911.

column16: Shooting spurred from earlier fights
column19: Suspect targeted one person but hit 5 other with bullets also another person was injured when students fled scene.

column16: Fight between Latino and Vietnamese students

column27: Tuan Do  Binh Tran  Duy Nguyen)

column16: Gang fight at school during night
column19: Fight between rival gang members. One killed and one injured by shotgun. 15YOM later charged.

column16: Student flashed gang sign at shooter

column16: Bystander student shot in hallway during gang shooting

The shooter and targeted victim had a dispute earlier during the school day over hand gestures/gang signs in the hallway. The two female students struck were both honor students.

column16: Gang related shooting in hallway

column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Bystander student hit during related drive-by

column16: Bystander student hit during related drive-by

column16: Playing with gun in classroom  shot himself in the head

Student had found gun and carried it with him for protection against gangs. 30 students were in the classroom during the shooting.

column16: Murder suicide of estranged wife in parking lot

column16: 4 youths shot victim during robbery
column19: 16YOM shot during robbery. 4 teens were trying to steal his new jacket.

column16: Fight in the hallway  shooter fired 4 random shots
column19: During a fight in the hallway  15YOM shooter fired 4 random shots striking 3 uninvolved students. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested. School had metal detectors but they were not used everyday.

column16: Fight between two girls in school bathroom

column16: Retaliation for previous beating by victim
column19: 17YOM shot 16YOM as he exited high school. Victim had beaten the shooter in a prior incident. Shooter fled the scene.

column16: Shooting during open gym at basketball court

column16: Shot teacher when she would not let him read poem in class
column19: Shooter had been writing poems about killing his teachers and suicide. Teacher had reported him to school officials which angered the shooter. During class the shooter asked to read a poem aloud and the teacher refused. The shooter shot the teacher in the face seriously injuring her.

column16: Dispute over theft of gold chain
column19: During a basketball game between rival schools  shots were fired during a dispute between students from different schools over a gold chain.

column16: Shooting during argument between victim and 3 males over girl

column16: Planned attack  took 22 hostages  upset over grade
column19: Shooter took pistol to school in a duffle bag. During class later in the day  the shooter pulled out the pistol and fired at the teacher killing her. Upset over grade from the prior week. Janitor came to investigate the sounds of the shooting and was killed by the shooter. Shooter stated he intended to kill 2 people so that he would get the death penalty. Shooter held the students hostage for about 15 minutes until releasing them 2 by 2 then surrendering to police. Shooter was from an extremely poor family without running water in their house. Shooter was a very good student and had recently gotten a low grade from the teacher that he was extremely upset about. Students reported he talked about killing himself while holding them hostage. Referenced the book Rage.

column16: Gun in backpack went off
column19: 15YOM student had gun in backpack. Gun accidentally discharged striking other student in chest and injuring another. Gun owner tried to aid the injured student.

column16: Suicide on school grounds
column19: 14YOM student found dead outside of school from self inflicted GSW.

column16: Suspect was in ongoing dispute with victims
column19: Ongoing dispute - victims were cousins.

column16: Bad blood between two non-students fighting in parking lot after school

column16: Shot during robbery
column19: Janitor heard gunshot  looked around but didn't see anything. Later 21YOM student was found dead in hallway by janitor. Victims pockets were turned inside out. No suspect identified.

column16: Shot self in classroom
column19: 14YOM shot self in classroom.

column16: Gang related shooting in school hallway
column19: Shooter had criminal history and gang affiliation. Shot and killed a student who was a rival gang member in a dispute in the school hallway. Shooter then robbed another student at gunpoint before leaving the scene.

column16: Suicide in cafeteria
column19: 15YOM student commit suicide in cafeteria.

column16: Ex-school athlete shot teracher in school parking lot
column19: Shooter confronted woman in 7-11 parking lot  shot her several times  then stole her vehicle. Shooter then drove to middle school where he confronted victim #2  shot her several time in the school parking lot. After shooting  shooter  picked up victim #2's body and placed into the back seat of her vehicle. Shooter then drove away and was later arrested. MOtive remained unknown - possibel mental health issue.

column16: Shot two students who bullied him
column19: Conflicting reports - suspect pulled out .38 revolver from backpack and shot two subjects who had been bullying him - suspect was acquitted at trial but sentenced to 5 years probation for bringing gun to school. Other report stated suspect shot victims due to them arguing with him about a girl he was dating.

column16: Shot ex-boyfriend in back of head in hallway
column19: 17YOF shot her ex-boyfriend in the hallway. She had told other students that she planned to kill herself and him prior to the shooting.

column16: Two students shot walking around school field
column19: Unknown shooter with shotgun fired at two students walking around the school baseball field.

column16: Burned down house  shot secretary  attempted to take principal hostage - tackled by school staff
column19: Shooter became delusional and thought he was being watched by the CIA. He burned down his father's house and went to the school with a shotgun. He fired a shot and killed the school nurse. He attempted to take the principal hostage but was instead tackled by the principal and detained until police arrived. Police reported the shooter was mentally ill.

column16: Baseball coach stuck by handgun fired 820 feet away
column19: Little league coach on baseball field struck by handgun round fired 820 away. Unknown if he was targeted.

column16: Suicide outside of school
column19: 33YOF commit suicide outside of high school. Father reported she had been depressed.

column16: Dispute over girl in school hallway

column16: Bullying  much larger bully shot in front of class

Shooter walked out of school and sat down next to tree until police arrived. Shooter was 5'3 and victim was 6'4. Victim had bullied the shooter. Other students described the victim as a frequent bully and a "big kid who got on people's nerves". Shooter had stolen the pistol from his mother's boyfriend gun safe and test fired it in his room prior to the shooting.

column16: Shooting in hallway related to quarrel
column19: Victim was former student who was expelled but was in school hallway. Shot by another student during an argument. Suspect fled and was later arrested. School has metal detectors and assigned police officers.

column16: Victim shot in classroom by unknown shooter
column19: Unknown shooter walked into classroom  shot 18YOM student  and fled the area. No suspect identified.

column16: Argument in cafeteria
column19: Fight between two students in cafeteria escalated into shooting.

column16: Argument in cafeteria  bystander shot
column19: Argument between group of male students in cafeteria. Bystander girl eating lunch was shot. 15YOM shooter fled.

column16: Argument over stolen beeper
column19: Victim and shooter had multiple arguments about a stolen beeper. During an argument in the school hallway  16YOM student shot 15YOM student in the head and fled.

column16: Gang related shooting at dismissal outside of school
column19: Gang related shooting. Part of 6 other shootings that occurred just off of school grounds in the first 2 weeks of the school year.

column19: Shooter walked onto the football field  fired multiple shots hitting 4 middle school students (minor injuries)  and shot himself in the head. Recent dishonorable discharge for Navy. column16: Shot victim in head after prior disputes
column19: Ongoing dispute - victim was sticking up for his younger brother which cause victim and suspect to begin feuding - things escalated over the next few weeks until suspect shot victim in head after a football game.

column19: Gang shooting during pickup football game. Bystanders killed (23YOM and 4 YOF). 23YOM and 15 YOM both arrested for shooting (both had guns and fired).

Shooter had been arrested for battery a student and loitering around the school building the previous year.

column16: Masked gunman shot student on school steps  possible gang related
column19: 18YOM student shot on the steps of the high school by a masked gunman who fled the area.

column19: 16YOM shot 15YOM outside of front door of school in gang related shooting.

column19: Suspect was angry for being reprimanded by school admin over his inappropriate remarks related to a student

column19: 17YOM student shot 3 times in parking lot after argument with a car full of unknown males.

column16: Unknown gunman fired during dismissal  no injuries
column19: Unknown shooter fired shots during dismissal.

column16: Targeted killing by gang members
column19: Group of gang members killed the victim while he was sitting in his car in the school parking lot.

column16: Special ed student shot in parking lot
column19: Well-liked special education student was shot in his car in the parking lot by an unknown gunman. No motive or suspect.

column16: Fight between gang members in band room
column19: Fight between two rival gang members. 15YOM shot 17YOM in band room.

column16: Shots fired during fight

column16: Bystander shot during fight that escalated

column16: Bystander student struck during gang shooting

column16: Suicide in classroom after being bullied
column19: Bullied - after being picked on in economics class he pulled out a handgun from his waistband  yelled  " I can't take it anymore " and shot himself in the head

column16: Accidental discharge in backpack  owner had prior charges

column16: Shot at bully  missed and struck other student

School system created an anti-bullying program in response.

column16: Commit suicide at school  upset about disciplinary problems
column19: 10YOM student shot himself in head. Shooter had been having disciplinary problems (5 recent notes from teacher for bad behavior).

column16: Shot overnight  found dead on steps  no suspects
column19: 21YOM found dead at school from overnight shooting. No suspect or motive.

column16: Accidental shooting
column19: Three 13YOM were playing with handgun in school when it accidentally discharged striking a 14YOM. All three youths were expected to be charged with illegal possession of handgun.

column16: Accidental discharge in classroom
column19: Students were watching a movie in a dark classroom. The shooter fired a shot (believed to be accidental) striking the student in front of him in the head. The gun was found in a school trashcan and the shooter was later apprehended but not identified.

column16: Showing off gun  discharged and struck bystander
column19: Student was showing off gun. Discharged striking a bystander.

column16: Fight ensued over stolen jewelry
column19: Shooting happened in parking lot over stolen jewelry. 2 students and another teenager were arrested - all were considered juveniles so names were not released.

column16: Shot herself behind the school
column19: 17YOF student told her friend she had taken pills and needed professional help. While friend went to get help  she went behind the school and killed herself with her father's pistol.

column16: Killed parents  went to school and took class hostage
column19: 17YOM killed parents and went to his school and took trigonometry class hostage for 30 minutes before surrendering to police.

column16: Shot during basketball game at school
column19: Ongoing feud between 15YOM and 17YOM escalated into shooting during basketball game at the school.

column16: Ongoing dispute  shooter warned victim he would kill him
column19: 17YOM shooter had warned 16YOM victim he was going to kill him. They had Ongoing fight. During an argument  shooter fired at victims head  then again while he was on the ground  then walked off.

column16: Killed by rival gang members
column19: Student was outside of high school when car with multiple males pulled up. Exchanged words about rival gang affiliations. Gang members in car fired multiple shots killing student and fled the area.

column16: Shot bully after being thrown into locker
column19: 14YOM shooter and 14YOM accomplice shot 16YOM bully in classroom and then fled the scene. Shooter had been bullied by target for extended period of time.

column16: Gang related drive-by shooting
column19: 16YOF and 2 male students were shot during a gang-related drive by shooting at the school. Law enforcement stated that there have been multiple shootings near the school in a turf battle between gangs.

column16: Accidental discharge while looking at gun in vehicle
column19: Shooter and victim were examining a handgun in the shooters truck before it accidentally went off and struck the victim in the calf - gun was later determined to be stolen.

column16: Anger for being suspended
column19: Shooter was suspended the prior day for smoking at school. Shooter walked to the school at the end of the school day and shot the principal who was standing in front of the school. He then shot himself in the head. His father was a behavioral specialist at another school. The shooter was well liked and smart. Shooter drank and smoked cigarettes.

column16: Gang related shooting  bystander student hit
column19: Unknown shooter on bicycle fired at crowd while riding by high school. Bystander female student was struck. Shooter fled. Police said the shooting was gang related.

column16: Distraught over girlfriend breakup - attempted suicide in classroom with weapon
column19: Shooter tried to commit suicide after girlfriend of 18 months broke up with him. He shot himself in front of her during 5 hour photography class. told friends prior he would do it - they didn't believe him as he had made threats in past.

column16: Female teenager (non-student) killed outside of school while walking home by unknown male
column19: Victim was walking home from football game and took shortcut through the elementary school grounds. Unclear if she was walking with an unknown male or being followed. She was found dead from a GSW to the head outside of the school. Victim was sexually assaulted prior to shooting. Unknown suspect and no arrest made.

column16: Stopped taking medications  fired at multiple school employees
column19: Shooter was a former student at Wickliffe Middle School. He shot and killed a custodian  as well as wounding the assistant principal  a police officer  and two teachers. Relatives reported shooter was diagnosed as having paranoid schizophrenia and had not been taking medications.

column16: Fired two shotgun shells from outside school administrator's office
column19: 16YO shooter fired two shots from outside the school office causing minor injuries to the school secretary. School was not in session during the shooting.

column16: Student shot during argument with 4 students
column19: 16YOM student shot during argument in hallway with 4 other students. Shooter was student with frequent disciplinary issues.

column16: Suicide in school hallway
column19: Shooter told another student at lunch that he was going to kill himself. Minutes later he shot himself in the school hallway. Shooter was a good student who had recently started to struggle in class.

column16: 8 males entered school seeking victim in retaliation for previous fight
column19: 8 males entered the school to confront a victim who had assaulted a female friend of theirs the previous week. A 14 year old in the group pulled a .380 handgun during the fight killing the targeted victim and injuring two other uninvolved students. Suspects fled the scene.

column16: Student commit suicide in hallway
column19: 15YOM commit suicide in hallway. Well liked student and football player. Other students knew he had the gun but did not want to tell school officials because of zero tolerance policy for weapons meaning he would be expelled.

column16: Left school to get gun after fight  returned and shot victim
column19: The shooter and victim go into an argument during the morning. The shooter left the school and went home to get a handgun he had stolen from his grandfather the prior year. The shooter walked into the cafeteria and fired 7 shots at the victim striking another girl in the crossfire. The shooter left the school and was arrested by police in a nearby field. It was reported that the shooter was selling marijuana and the victim had stolen some of it from him that morning when he refused to pay. Shooter referred to himself as "Mr. Murder" to police.

column16: Killed principal after discipline for poor grades
column19: 13YOM had discipline issues with grades and dress code. Walked into principal's office with sawed off shotgun and killed him. Ran from the scene and dropped the shotgun while running causing it to fire killing him (remains unclear if it was accidental or suicide).

column16: Two students shot by gang member
column19: Two students shot by gang member on the athletic field of the school. Students were involved in an anti-gang youth group.

column16: Student shot teacher during class
column19: 13 year old shoots teacher in chest during class - reason not stated

column16: Shot in leg by gang member
column19: 15YOF was shot in leg by gang member in the hallway. Made false statement to police about the identify of the shooter due to fear of retribution.

column16: Shooting in parking lot at end of school day
column19: Formed student fired handgun at a female student in the parking lot after school striking her and another female student.

column16: Shot victim in bathroom then fled
column19: 12YOM shooter had asked victim to go out with him and she refused. Shooter was sitting with other students outside of school with sawed off shotgun. Shooter saw the victim and followed her into the bathroom. He shot her in the head and fled the scene.

column16: Shooter retaliated for previous assault by victim
column19: 15YOM shooter had been jumped by victim and his friend that morning. Shooter shot and killed victim with .38 handgun.

column16: Drive-by shooting by student from rival school at football game
column19: Student and former student killed during drive-by shooting by student from rival school during football game. Fist fight between the shooter and victims prior to the shooting.

column16: Shots fired during argument
column19: Shooter shot victim who was arguing with shooter's younger brother

column16: Shooter had ongoing conflict with victim (possible bullying was involved)
column19: Shooter stole the handgun from a neighbor and brought it to school. Showed the gun to multiple other students and said he planned to kill somebody. None of the students reported this to any of the school staff. Shooter had an ongoing dispute with the victim. During a fight in the courtyard  the shooter pulled the handgun and fired all 13 rounds at the victim. Authorities found the shooter in a wooded area across from the school and arrested him. Some students thought the victim was bullied  others thought it involved gangs

column16: Anger of suspension  shot 3 teachers
column19: Shooter had been suspended from school. Entered building with .38 pistol and walked into specific classroom to fire at teacher. Shot the first in the head and injured a second. Shot a third teacher (who authorities believed had a heart attack and actually died from a gunshot) before shooting himself in the head. Shooter believe he was suspended because he was black and white students wouldn't be suspended for making an obscene gesture.

column16: Attempted suicide after poor grades
column19: Student shot herself after being called to principal's office to meet with her mother about her report card

column16: Shooter had ongoing feud for more than year with victims
column19: Shooter lived in same housing project as the victims and had Ongoing dispute for more than year. Shooter approached victims at end of the school day and fired multiple shots injuring 4 targeted victims. Shooter fled the scene and was arrested days later.

column16: Took bus full of disabled students hostage
column19: Shooter was upset with the IRS. He took elementary school bus with disabled students hostage and forced it to drive 15 miles to a restaurant (famous Joe's Stone Crabs). Told police he had a bomb on the bus. Shooter was killed by police when hostage negotiations failed. Likely copycat of movie "Speed".

column16: Planned attack  shot 3 teacher before being tackled by football coach; blamed teachers for allowing bullying
column19: Shooter hid .22 rifle in the bushes and retrieved it during the school day. He shot and killed two teachers. He fired at a third and missed striking another student. He was tackled by the football coach and restrained until police arrived. Shooter was obsessed with the movie Natural Born Killers  dressed in all black  listened to death metal  and abused drugs/alcohol. Father was physically abusive. Bullied by classmates for being small and quiet. Blamed the teachers for allowing the bullying to happen.

column2: Thomas A. Edison Vocational and Technical High School
column16: Shot during robbery for gold chain
column19: Three suspected approached the victim outside of the school and asked him to give them his gold chain. The suspect refused and one of the suspects shot him three times then fled the scene.

column16: Commit suicide in school hallway
column19: Commit suicide in school hallway. No other details available.

column16: Fight between non-students outside of the school
column19: Shooter and victim had been in a long standing feud. Neither were students at the school. The victim was picking up his younger brother when the shooter saw him. The victim started running  the shooter put on a ski mask and chased him into the school. The shooter caught the victim in a stairwell and fired multiple shots killing him then fled the scene.

column16: Shot while trying to break up fight after basketball game
column19: Victim tried to break up a fight between several women after a basketball game. Victim was shot and killed by unknown shooter.

column16: Student dressed as cowboy planned attack/hostages; subdued by teacher
column19: Shooter was dressed as a cowboy with rifle and two pistols. Walked into classroom and shot the teacher and three students. He took the other students hostage and planned use them to escape. Shooter was tackled by another teacher allowing the students to escape and held until police arrived. Shooter had planned the shooting and made references to Pearl Jam song about commiting suicide at school  Stephen King book Rage  and the movie Natural Born Killers. Shooter said he tried to model himself after the character in Rage who kills a teacher and two students.

column16: Suicidal - shot randomly at students then killed himself
column19: 16 year old student was depressed over issues with girlfriend - drove his car onto school basketball court and began throwing money out window - when students came to pick up he randomly started shooting at them  shot several bullets into nearby classroom then shot himself.

column16: Ongoing argument for 3 days escalated into shooting
column19: 15YOM shooter killed victim while students were lining up to get on the school bus. Shooter and victim had been arguing for the past 3 days.

column16: Hitman hired to kill pregnant student
column19: Hitman (Nettles) was hired to kill pregnant student. Shooter shot the bus driver and the pregnant victim multiple times and fled the scene. 30 YOM married neighbor of the victim had gotten her pregnant and she did not want an abortion.

column16: Shot himself during algebra
column19: 15YOM pulled 9mm handgun out of coat pocket during algebra class and killed himself.

column16: Students shot with pellet gun while walking between classrooms
column19: Two students were shot by pellet gun while walking between classes. Shooter was a student and fled the area.

column16: Fight in parking lot escalated into shooting
column19: 16YOM shooter killed victim with shotgun during argument in the school parking lot.

column16: Shot in the gym
column19: 23YOM shot in the gym of the school. No other information.

column16: Shot bus driver  stole bus  crashed bus  killed self
column19: 15YOM shot the bus driver  stole the school bus  crashed into multiple cars  crashed into house  and shot himself (suicide).

column16: Student executed outside of school by another student
column19: 14YOM executed 14YOM student in front of multiple witnesses to increase his "street cred" with a gang.

column16: Shot self prior to classes starting
column19: 16YOM commit suicide as students were arriving for class.

column16: Missed intended target  hit two other students in stairwell
column19: 18YOM targeted specific victim in school stairwell between classes. Missed victim and struck two other students causing injuries. Ran to next class and was found by police officers based on witness statements. Police officer assigned to school was in the stairwell during the shooting.

column16: Recently expelled student shot teacher
column19: Shooter (student) killed teacher at school for troubled students. Shooter ran from classroom but was detained by other teachers. The shooter had been expelled from another school the week prior. Motive is unknown.

column16: Two women killed outside of school during domestic
column19: Victim was the cousin of Stacy Buxton-Boyd  the estranged wife of Steven Boyd  who shot and killed both women as they waited for Stacy's children to be dismissed from school

column16: Shooting on track after football game
column19: 18YOM near the track at St. Bernard shortly after 10 p.m.; shot by a 17-year-old Jordan High School football player following a football game between the two schools; another youth was also shot and hospitalized

column16: Fight (escalated)
column19: Ongoing dispute between the shooter and victim. They were fighting on the bus and had to be seperated. Shooter pulled a .22 handgun and shot the victim once in the neck and fled the scene. Gun was found near his house.

column16: Shots fired during fight in hallway
column19: 17YOM shot by 15YOM during a fight among several students;

column16: Officers gun discharged during fight killing victim
column19: Fight after a basketball game at the school. Police officer was trying to detain suspects involved in fight when officer's gun discharged killing 19YOM victim.

column16: Fight during basketball game
column19: Fight between multiple students during a basketball game during school day gym class. Shooter fled. Students said the shooting was in retaliation for an altercation the prior day.

column16: Fight over watch
column19: Victim was wearing a watch that his mother had gotten him from India. There was a debt and Ongoing feud between the shooter and the victim. The shooter wanted the victim's watch as payment for the debt  a fight started  and the shooter killed the victim. Incident happened in the school just before classes started. Shooter fled the area and hid the gun outside of the school.

column16: Escalation of argument
column19: Victim previoulsy got into altercation with shooter over a stolen radio.
