On the day of the shooting  victim was walking towaed school from  from school parking lot across the street when shooter - who was passenger in a car that pulled up to where victim was walking - jumped out and shot victim multiple times. Shooter then fled  but was later arrested and charged.

column16: Prolonged bullying  asked teachers for help
column19: Snuck shotgun into the cafeteria of the school and fired at random students. Shooting did not go as a he planned so he started running. He was confronted by teachers who persuaded him to put the gun down. Shooter talked about planning a school shooting and told multiple students about it. Asked two others to help him learn how to fire a shotgun. Students gathered on the second floor balcony above the cafeteria because he told them that would be where the action was. Shooter left suicide note explaining he was angry and depressed. Girlfriend had recently broken up with him. Abused as a child. Father was in prison for shooting up a newspaper office when they wouldn't print his political rant. Pointed the gun at himself multiple times during the shooting. Bullied extensively.

column16: Shot self on field after sports tryout
column19:
17YOF shot self due to upset over
her poor showing in a recent tryout for an athletic
scholarship

column16: Argument earlier in day  shooter went to get gun and shot victim involved in conflict
column19: Victim and shooter had Ongoing conflict and altercation earlier in the school day. Shooter left to get gun and returned to school to confront victim. Shot victim during argument and fled the area.

column2: Maria Del Rey Junior High School
column16: Student shot during drive-by outside of school
column19: 14YOM shot during drive-by outside of school. Unknown if victim was target or bystander.

column16: Student shot by gang members outside of school
column19: 17YOM shot multiple time trying to flee from 2 gang members (15YOM and 14YOM students) outside of school.

column16: Shot on steps outside of school
column19: 19YOM victim shot on the steps of the school by unknown shooter.

column16: Shooter lost $20 to victim in poker game at school - shot him in fit of rage
column19: 17 year old shooter and 14 year old victim were playing poker in stairwell of school - shooter lost $20 to victim. When victim refused to return the money  shooter shot victim in thigh. Shooter immediately left school to dispose of gun then returned. Eventually cooperated with police and led them to gun.

column16: Showing off gun at lunch
column19: 16 year old male came to school with .38 caliber hidden in pants - was in cafeteria showing off gun when he accidentally shot himself in the leg.

column16: Escalation of argument
column19: Both shooter and victim were in summer school together. Witnesses say each were bicering at each other all day. At time of shooting  victim was seated in his car. Shooter retrieved .38 caliber handgun from his car  walked over to victim and shot him once in teh chest. Shooter then sat on the hood of his vehicle and immedaitely surrendered to school officials.

column16: Planned attack including ex-girlfriend as target
column19: Killed mother  stole her car  and drove to school with rifle. Wore trench coat to conceal the rifle while walking into school. Shot ex-girlfriend and her friend then random students. Car got stuck in the field behind the school while trying to make a getaway and he was held a gunpoint by the assistant principal until police arrived. Talked about his plan to attack the school with multiple other students (5 were charged with conspiracy). Shooter had been bullied. Was a good student and excelled in art.

column16: Escalation of argument
column19: Victim was riding in car with driver when shooter  who was in school parking lot made obscene gesture to victim. Victim and driver of vehilce pulled into paring lot to confront shooter. Shooter pulled out 9mm handgun and shot victim in the shoulder. Victim and driver fled and called police.

column16: Dispute between rival gang members at football game
column19: Fight between members are rival gangs at the high school's homecoming game.

column16: Shot self in school bathroom
column19: 19YOM commit suicide in school bathroom

column16: Shots fired during fight
column19: Shots fired during a fight. Shooter admitted to using cocaine and marijuana.

column16: 2 students shot in vehicle outside of school
column19: Two 16YOFs shot in vehicle outside of the school. Cause unknown.

column16: Killed ex-girlfriend and self at school
column19: Former student returned to school and killed ex-girlfriend (current student) and then himself in front of dozens of other students. Shooter was honors student while in school.

column16: Two students chased and shot
column19: 18YOM student shot 17YOM student outside of school and then chased 14YOM into neighborhood where he fatally shot him in a residential area.

column16: Parent killed  related to custody battle with ex-wife
column19: 47YOM shot 4 times in car in parking lot waiting to pick up daughter. Victim was in custody battle with ex-wife and had recently threatened her.

column16: Planned attack  fired at multiple students in front of school then sat down and surrender
column19: Shooter took a rifle  shotgun  and .22 pistol to school wrapped in blankets saying it was an art project. He stopped outside at a prayer circle  took out the pistol  and fired 8 shots killing 3 and wounding 5. He then put the pistol down and stood there until confronted by school officials. He said "please kill me  I can't believe what I've done". Sent to mental health institution where he was diagnosed with schizotypal personality disorder and later paranoid schizophrenia. Shooter had brought a gun to school previously that was taken away by another student. Shooter warned that something big was going to happen on Monday but students didn't believe him.
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Planned attack  fired at random students from the woods near the school
column19: Shooter fired from the woods at random students walking in the parking lot with a .22 rifle. Two students were struck and sustained minor injuries. Police dogs tracked the shooter back to house where he was arrested. Shooter said he wanted to target random people to cause pain.

column16: Shooter believed teacher was having affair with his wife  killed teacher and commit suicide.
column19: 61YOM shot teacher 4 times in the parking lot and then killed self in nearby park. Shooter believe the teacher was having an affair with his wife.

column16: Commit suicide in school hallway
column19: 14YOM student was standing around in the hallway joking around with friends. Reached into his locker and took out a rifle  then shot himself in the head. Had told his classmates something big would happen that day.

column16: Drive by gang shooting in parking lot
column19: 17YOM and 18YOF student were sitting in car in parking lot. Car pull up next to them and fired multiple shots killing the 17YOM student. Police said the crime was gang related.

column16: Planned attack by two shooter  shot students are pulling fire alarm and fled in stolen vehicle
column19: Johnson (13) stole his parents car and went with Golden (11) to his grandparents house where they knew guns were unlocked. Drove to the school  pulled the fire alarm  and fired at the students exiting from the bushes. They had 9 weapons including a 30-06 and .30 M1 carbine and 2000 rounds. They fled the scene in the parent's van but were apprehended by police. Both were known as bullies. Both talked about wanting to be members of "Bloods" street gang but had a "lot of killing to do first". Golden had frequent fights and shot/killed a female students cat. Johnson was sexually abused at age 6 and abused a 3 year old girl when he was 12. Both were released when they turned 21 due to state laws. Johnson was arrested shortly after release for drug possession  unregistered handgun  and theft. All victims were female.
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Commit suicide in car in parking lot
column19: 18YOM student shot self in car in parking lot. Other students witnessed the suicide. Student was well liked and had good grades.

column16: Shot at principal  missed  ditched gun  and fled scene
column19: 13YOM student was angry about being sent home. The fired a shot (missed) at the principal in the school courtyard  threw the gun in a bush  and fled the area. Principal said the student had no major disciplinary issues.

column16: Shot herself in bathroom
column19: 13YOF student shot herself in the school bathroom.

column16: Angry about grade  fired 5 shots into the school's front door
column19: 14YOM student stole his father's car  drove to school  and fired 5 shots at the front door. Students inside were nearly struck. He was upset about his grades and the report cards were being distributed that day. Fled the scene after the shooting.

column16: Drive by shooting outside of school
column19: Two students outside of the school were shot in a drive by shooting. It was unclear if the students were part of a gang or mistaken for gang members. No shooter identified.

column16: Planned attack at school dance
column19: End of year dance was at a local restaurant. Shooter shot and killed a teacher standing outside and then fired shots at the dance floor striking 3 students. Restaurant owner armed with a shotgun chased the shooter down and held him until police arrived. Shooter said he wanted to make the night memorable. Shooter had been normal but became distant before the shooting. He told other students he wanted to kill them and commit suicide.

column16: Carjacking of janitor  shot him
column19: Group of youths carjacked the school janitor when he was leaving. 15YOM shot him in the head during the carjacking.

column16: Disagreement between rival gang members
column19: Dispute between members of rival "party crews" behind the elementary school after classes had ended. 14YOM killed 17YOM and 14 YOM and injured 15 YOM then fled the scene.

column16: Gang related shooting when student was exiting school at night
column19: Student shot multiple times exiting school at night. Police arrested an unidentified teen and said it was gang related.

column16: Went into school to kill estranged wife  school aid wounded
column19: Deputy Sheriff went into children's school to find his estranged wife. She ran from him and took shelter in the school office. He followed her into the office and shot her multiple times in front of staff and students. A school aid in the office was also struck by a bullet. Shooter fled the area and was later arrested.

column16: Fight over girl outside of school
column19: Fight over a girl occured behind the school building after school dismissed and escalated into a fatal shooting. No other students were injured.

column16: Angry over being arrested and facing expulsion for bringing gun to school earlier that day
column19: Day before shooting  the shooter bought a stolen firearm from a friend and brought it to school. The parent who owned the firearm noticed it was missing and police searched school finding it in the shooters locker. He was then suspended pending expulsion from school and arrested (booked and release). He went home  got a pistol from his room and killed his mother and father (both teachers). Said the disappointment of him being expelled out break them. Wrote a suicide note and left it on the table explaining that voices wouldn't stop telling him to kill people. Wore a trench coat to the school the next day with a rifle and 2 pistols. Fired 51 rounds (had 1100 total with him) into the crowded cafeteria before being tackled by multiple injured students. He screamed kill me while they held him down. When the police arrived  he managed to pull a knife and told the police officers to kill him but he was arrested. Parents had told friends they were scared of their son and didn't know what else to do. Students said he talked often about shootings and violence.
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Pulled gun on bus  ordered girlfriend to get off then shot himself
column19: 15YOM pulled a gun on a bus  ordered his girlfriend to get off the bus  and then killed himself.

column16: Bullied  told he would need to repeat 9th grade  killed himself
column19: 15YOM was frequently bullied. Told that he would need to repeat 9th grade and commit suicide that day.

column16: Gang related shooting outside of school
column19: 14YOM and 20YOM killed in gang related shooting outside of middle school during evening. Unclear if either were students. No suspect identified.

column16: Murder suicide after breakup  victim was teacher
column19: 29YOM killed 26YOF in murder suicide after breakup. Female was a teacher at the school.

column16: Fight (escalated) between juveniles  two teachers struck
column19: Fight between two students inside the school escalated into a shooting. A police officer assigned to the school chased the fleeing shooter to a wooded area outside of the school where he was arrested. Media reported the school had an ongoing issue with large fights involving multiple students.

column16: Gang fight in parking lot  one shot (student involved in fight)
column19: Fight between two groups of gang members in the parking lot. Started as a fist fight but a gun was pulled and shot was fired injuring on student (gang member).

column16: Gang related shooting following prior fight
column19: Two teenage gang members (19YOM 15 YOM) fired multiple shots in the hallway at rival gang members. Two students and one teacher were struck. Shooters fled the scene.

column16: Teen shot himself in the arm
column19: 17 year old teen shot himself in arm but blamed another student. Police did not believe his story that another student  who the teen did not know threatened him and then shot him on the school grounds. Police reported that the teen shot himself in the arm because he was unhappy with being sent to public school after being homeschooled.

column16: Dispute over a girl at end of school day
column19: Victim was leaving school after early dismissal when he was approached by two men. One of the men opened up with a semi-automatic assault rifle hitting the victim in the stomach. Victim later died at the hospital. Both men were later arrested.

column16: Suicide in school bathroom
column19: 14 year old teen brought her father's gun to school and shot herself in the head Monday morning in the school's second floor bathroom - she died later that night at hospital - unknown reason - no note left.

column16: Parent shot teacher during argument at parent-teacher conference
column19: Shooter  the wife of a Garym IN police detective  shot a female elementary teacher during a parent teacher conference. During the meeting an argument ensued and several shot were fired by the shooter  one of which ricocheted off the floor and hit the teacher - shooter arrested. Other reports state argument occurred in gymnasium after school basketball game.

column16: Playing with gun on school bus
column19: 7th grade boy accidentally shot another boy on the school bus. The shooter had brought a .22 caliber handgun with him and was showing the other student when the gun went off striking the victim in the leg.

column16: Planned murder/suicide pact
column19: Male and female students in romantic relationship found shot in school bathroom. Murder-suicide pact.

column16: Retaliation for stabbing the prior day
column19: 18YOM and 16 YOM students were standing outside of the school when they were shot by an 16YOM who fled in a vehicle. Police said the shooting stemmed from a stabbing the prior day.

column16: Shot self in school bathroom
column19: 15YOM student shot himself in the school bathroom.

column16: Masked shooter entered classroom and fired multiple shots at student
column19: 14YOM student was shot multiple times by a masked gunman. Gunman fled the scene to a waiting car. Police said the shooting was gang related.

column16: Held 4 teachers hostage for 12 hours  angry about lack of black teachers
column19: 44YOM held 4 teachers hostage for 12 hours. Shooter was angry about the lack of black teachers in the school. Shooter also had a history of mental illness. Shooter was subdued when federal agents raided the building.

column16: Shot security guard in targeted shooting
column19: 26 year old male approached a 57 year old school security officer who was working a high school volleyball game. The shooter shot the victim twice in the chest and once in the groin. The shooter then fled - when spotted by the police  the shooter shot himself in the head. He was pronounced dead at the hospital. The shooter had 32 rounds of ammo on him and was not known to have a prior criminal record.

column16: Fired two shots inside school and surrendered when confronted by police
column19: Shooter brought a shotgun to school wrapped in a blanket and fired two shots into the ceiling and the door of the gym. Nobody was injured. Police officers were nearby  entered the school  and confronted the shooter. He dropped the weapon with 3 unfired shells inside. The shooter was incoherent and taken for mental health custody.

column16: Planned attack and bombing of school
column19: Shooter planned a bombing of the school that they hoped would rival the Oklahoma City bombing. They placed two propane tank bombs in the school set to detonate at 11:17. When the bombs didn't go off  they entered the school and shot random victims. The shooters eventually commit suicide after the building was surrounded by police. They spent more than a year planning the attack. Shooter has contact with law enforcement 15 times before the shootings. Made previous death threats to students. Weapons: 12-gauge  9mm  TEC-9  12-gauge sawed-off shotgun
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Shooter targeted victim due to prior fight  hit the girl the target was walking with
column19: 14YOM had prior fights with a 14YOM targeted victim. Shooter was suspended and waiting outside of the school for the victim to exit. Target was walking with a 14 YOF student. Shooter fired at them and struck only the female student then feld.

column2: Martin Luther King Jr. Middle School
column16: Victim shot in back outside school  shooter and victim had Ongoing dispute
column19: 17YOM fired 3 shots into the back of 13YOM in the school parking lot after band practice. The shooter and victim had an Ongoing dispute. Shooter fled and was arrested the next day.

column16: Columbine inspired  depressed  told other students about desire to commit school shooting
column19: Shooter used a .22 rifle to fire in a crowded common area of the school before classes started. Shooter was tackled by the principal and began crying. Shooter had been good student but his grades had dropped. Other students were worried about him. He was obsessed with Columbine and talked about wanting to shoot up the school. Weapons: .22-caliber rifle  .357-caliber
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Suicide in parking lot of school
column19: 16YOF shot herself in the parking lot of the school.

column16: Shot self in school bathroom
column19: Well liked student shot himself in the chest in the bathroom.

column16: Girl shot in head outside of school  long range shot
column19: 10YOF safety patrol shot outside of school by single .22 to the head. Police believed the shooting was accidental because of the distance the shot traveled.

column16: Principal grabbed gun during fight between student  shot in foot
column19: Gun was pulled during a fight in the hallway between students. Principal was trying to break up the fight and grabbed the gun. It fired striking him in the foot. Students involved fled the area.

column16: Gang related shooting outside of school
column19: Two students standing with a group of other students outside the school were shot by two gang members. The shooting may have involved the theft of a bicycle. A 18 YOM and 14 YOM were arrested shortly after the shooting.

column16: Student shot by group of multiple students outside of school
column19: 17YOM student standing outside of school was approached by a group of teens. Multiple shots were fired and the student was seriously injured. Group of teens fled and were not identified.

column16: Bus driver killed janitor then self (believed wife was having affair)
column19: Bus driver believed the custodian was having an affair with his wife. Killed him early in the morning at the school then drove away and killed himself.

column16: Shooter thought victim had insulted his girlfriend
column19: 19YOM former student shot 16YOM outside of the school. Shooter believed the victim had insulted his girlfriend. A 17YOM dropout was also charged with helping to plan the murder.

column16: Showing off gun in bathroom  accidental discharge
column19: 16YOM was showing off gun in bathroom. Accidental discharge struck a 15YOM in the head. 16YOM and other 14YOM fled the scene. Ditched the gun in a nearby apartment complex and returned to school. Arrested 2.5 hours later.

column16: Fired shot and then surrendered to school officials
column19: Shooter pulled out a handgun and fired a single close range shot striking a 13 YOF student in the head. Shooter was immediately confronted by school officials and surrendered to police. No motive was established. Due to New Mexico's juvenile laws  the max sentence was 2 years. The shooter was arrested at 17 for drug trafficking on the Mexico border.

column16: Fired shots at the crowd outside of the school  tackled by SRO and teacher  inspired by Columbine
column19: Shooter was straight A student with lots of friend and no prior mental health issues or history of violence. Shooter fired 13 rounds from a handgun into the crowd of students outside of the school just prior to the school day starting. Did not have any targets or know any the students he fired at. He was tackled by a teacher and police officer. Shooter had been reading about the Columbine shooting. In court he said that he did not know why he committed the shooting. Released from juvenile custody when he was 18 and attended college.

column16: Fight between students  shooter fired two shots that missed target and fled
column19: Fight between 2 16YOM students behind the school. One student pulled a handgun  fired two shots that missed  and fled the scene. Shooter was arrested later and charged with felony.

column16: Four students from another high school involved in fight in parking lot  shots fired
column19: 4 students from another high school (West Mesa) were involved in a fight with Albuquerque High School students in the parking lot at lunch. 5 shots were fired and the students fled the scene in a car.

column16: Accidental discharge while passing pistol to friend in parking lot
column19: 17YOM killed best friend when pistol he was passing to 16YOM student discharged. Students had been involved in burglaries where pistol was stolen.

column16: Fired rifle into school building  made bomb threat
column19: 17YOM dropout fired rifle into the school gym missing students inside. Shooter also made bomb threat. Three other students were charged with conspiracy to plan an attack.

column16: Ongoing dispute that escalated
column19: 13 year old student fired 5 shots at a 17 year old student inside a vehicle in the school parking lot. None of the shots struck anyone. Reported to be Ongoing dispute between students. Shooter immediately fled the scene and was arrested later.

column16: Shooter targeted victim he was fighting with  missed and hit female student
column19: Shooter fired at 17YOM student he had ongoing fight with as students lined up for the school buses. Shot missed striking a female student.

column2: Penn Wood East Junior High School
column16: Ongoing fight  fired gun and missed  pointed at principal and misfired
column19: 13YOM had ongoing fight with 14YOM student. Got handgun from 25YOM and confronted 14YOM. Fired shot that hit the ground. Principal heard the shot and ran over. 13YOM pointed the gun at the principal and fired but the gun jammed.

column16: Accident discharge in bathroom  round went through wall and struck student in a classroom
column19: Shooter was playing with gun in the bathroom. Accidental discharge. Round when through the wall and struck another student in the classroom next door causing minor injuries. Student ditched the gun in the stairwell and fled the scene.

column16: Playground fight with the victim
column19: 6 year old shooter shot another 6 year old classmate in the head with a single shot in their classroom. The shooter and victim had an altercation on the playground. The shooter's father was in prison for drug related crimes. The shooters mother was a drug addict and living in a crack house where the boy found the gun.

column16: Shots fired during fight at school dance
column19: Argument between two teenage groups during high school dance to celebrate championship game.

column16: Took class hostage  wanted to go to jail to be with mother
column19: 13YOM pointed loaded handgun at teachers and students in classroom and told them to get on the floor. Held them hostage for 5 minutes before surrendering. Shooter's mother was in jail and he wanted to be with her. Gun was locked at home but shooter found the key.

column16: Feud between parents turned into shooting at track meet.
column19: Fight between 33 YOF and 35YOF parents in the stands at a track meet turned into a shooting. A police officer was working at the event and grabbed the gun.

column16: Teacher shot herself and made up story about being shot by unknown student
column19: 35YOF teacher said she was shot by student with a shaved head but it was later determined that she shot herself. She was trying to make a statement about school security. Sent to mental institution following the shooting.

column16: Shot self in parking lot
column19: 16YOM student shot himself in his car in the school parking lot. In critical condition.

column16: Killed estranged wife in preschool classroom  students were present
column19: 39YOM killed estranged wife at preschool. Shooter walked into classroom with a gun  struck wife  and forced her into bathroom where he shot her and shot himself. Preschool students were present in the classroom at the time of the shooting.

column16: Teacher had given F on assignment (possibly throwing water balloons)
column19: Shooter had received an F on an assignment and been suspended from school earlier that day for throwing a water balloon. Shooter got the gun after leaving the school and returned to the teachers classroom and fired multiple shots killing him. Shooter said it was a stupid decision that he made because he was angry. No history of violence or mental illness. Shooter was an honor student and completed an undergraduate degree while in prison. Shooter's family had frequent domestic issues and police responded to multiple calls to the home.

column16: Jumped on cafeteria table  fired one shot into ceiling  ordered students to go to the stage but they fled  then shooter fled
column19: 13YOM got on cafeteria table and fired gun into the ceiling. Made prior warning to students that today was their last day at school. He ordered the students to get on the stage in the cafeteria (possible attempting to take hostages) but the students fled the area. Shooter then fled and was later arrested. Shooter had 116 round of ammunition and a knife. 12YOM student was also arrested. Possible copycat of the movie they had recently seen that involves hostages according to a relative.

column16: Ongoing feud with victim  shot him in parking lot of school
column19: 18YOM had ongoing conflict with 17YOM student. Shot him in parking lot when he knew he was leaving the school. 18YOM who drove him was also charged.

column16: Cafeteria worker shot by estranged husband  fled  later commit suicide at home
column19: 66YOM shot his estranged wife in her car in the school parking lot before the school day. He fled and drove to his house where he commit suicide.

column16: Robbery
column19: Shooter confronted victim in school parking lot over prior robbery. Shooter stated he only menat to rob victim  and the shooting was accidental.

column16: Fired shot into classroom ceiling  surrendered gun to SRO after 25 minutes  motive unclear
column19: 14YOM fired shot into the ceiling of the classroom. He was upset about issues with his family. Surrendered the gun to the SRO after 25 minutes. No one was injured. Motive or plan is unknown.

column16: Multiple prior fights between shooter and victim
column19: Two students 13YOM and 15 YOM had been in multiple fights together. The 13 YO got a handgun from another 13 YO who was suspended. The school had metal detectors so they passed the gun through the fence. The 13 YO fired at the 15 YO. The 15 YO took the gun away and fired at the 13 YO. Both were critically injured.

column16: Two non-student shot outside school  likely gang related
column19: Two non-students were refused entry to the homecoming dance. When the dance was ending  they were shot outside of the school by an unknown shooter. 4 police officers were working at the dance. Police said the shooting was likely related to gang activity in the area.

column16: Held elementary school class hostage until surrendering
column19: 14YOM male former student dressed in camouflage held elementary school class hostage at gunpoint before releasing the students and then surrendering. Shooter was upset with his family.

column16: Held 19 students and teacher hostage for 30 minutes
column19: 15YOM student held class hostage with 9mm handgun for 30 minutes before being subdued by police. Shooter was upset after being scolded by teacher and pulled gun out of backpack.

column16: Setup camera and shot self in parking lot in front of school
column19: 17YOM student setup camera in the parking lot in front of the school and then shot himself in the head. Multiple students witnessed the suicide occur. Shooter had told older students that he planned to kill himself but they did not take him seriously. Shooter was into cinema and made short films. Students thought he was filming for a project prior to firing the gun.

column16: Accidental discharge  shot self showing off gun
column19: Shooter was carrying handgun in waistband and showed it to other students during the school day. Shooter said he was planning to shoot another student he had been in a fight with. Gun accidentally discharged injuring the shooter. He was arrested without incident.

column16: Special education student shot outside school in drive by
column19: Special education student was shot in the neck outside of the school during a drive by. Student ran to the principal's office where he died. Student was well liked and had no connections to gangs or issues with other students. No description of the shooter or the vehicle.

column16: Teens shot armored car guard picking up money from the school
column19: Two teens shot armored car guard picking up money from the elementary school. Suspects fled and no students were injured.

column16: Shot himself in leg during class  fled  ditched gun  then went to nurses office
column19: 14YOM student shot himself in class  fled the scene  threw the gun outside of the school  and then went to the nurses office for medical assistance. School has 9 full time security officers.

column16: Distraught over family issues - wanted to die at the hands of police - took hostage in school
column19: 17YOM non-student fired shots at a female students car in the parking lot and took her hostage at gunpoint. He had no relation with her. He walked her into an outdoor courtyard between classrooms. He told her he was in a gang and wanted to die from being shot by the police. When the shooter held the gun to the victims head  a police officer fired and killed him. Most students were evacuated but 60 in the area of shooter saw him killed by police.

column16: Shooting stemmed from a fight that occurred a month prior
column19: Suspect and another man approached victim as victim was walking into school. Victim shot three times - suspects fled the scene - cause of shooting was deemed to be retaliation for previous altercation a month prior.

column16: 2 students and 1 teacher shot in bandroom by unknown student  possible to get class dismissed early
column19: 2 students and 1 teacher shot in the band room by an unknown shooter. A bomb threat had been called in earlier that day. Police believed both were related to trying to get school dismissed for the day.

column16: Student shot himself in parking lot  upset about breakup
column19: 18YOM student shot himself in the parking lot after meeting with the school counselor. Shooter had recently broken up with his girlfriend.

column16: Bullying  planned attack  planned suicide by cop
column19: Shooter was planning attack with 2 other students but they backed out. They had told approximately 50 other people about the plans including adults. Shooter told friends he was going to do it Monday the weekend before the shooting and gave them his possessions. Shooter had a .22 handgun with 40 rounds  he was worried the gun was not powerful enough to kill people. Shooter fired at multiple students from the bathroom and including firing at two school employees who thought fire crackers were going off. When SWAT entered the bathroom  he had the gun to his head but couldn't pull the trigger. Shooter reported thinking about suicide the night before but decided to do the shooting. Shooter had been seriously bullied for years including beatings and being lit on fire. Shooter had abused RX drugs  cocaine  and alcohol since age 12. Shooters parents were divorced. He was sexually assaulted by his mother's boyfriend. Unsupervised by father. Moved frequently. Very poor performance in school.

column16: Two teens went into school looking for student they had conflict with  fired shots
column19: Chronically troubled student who had multiple robbery charges went into the school after hours with another teen. They were looking for a 17 YOM student who they had an ongoing fight with. They found him in the cafeteria and during a fight the 14YOM shooter fired one shot then fled the scene. He was arrested 2 days later. The school has armed security guards who leave at 4:30PM  shooting occurred just after that. The shooter knew the target would be at the school for a fashion show rehearsal.

column16: Bullied student shot head cheerleader
column19: Shooter she was depressed and had taken to cutting her arms with a razor in the months before the shooting. She said she stole a .22-caliber pistol from her father's collection and brought it to school because she wanted people to "know my pain" from repeated teasing. She shot the head cheerleader in the shoulder from behind. About 100 students were in the cafeteria when Bush fired. A 14-year-old classmate who rode the bus with her talked her into dropping the gun. She was sentenced to an open-ended term at a psychiatric facility and released after 3 years.

column16: Student pulled gun in class  talked about suicide  talked into surrendering by two other students
column19: 16YOM student had talked to other students about suicide. He pulled a gun in the classroom and was talking about killing himself. Students fled the room but 2 JROTC students remained behind and talked shooter into surrendering to police. No shots fired. No injuries.

column16: Planned attack  SRO at school shot at shooter and detained him
column19: Shooter stood outside of school and fired shotgun and .22 rounds at the windows of the building. 4 students were injured by broken glass. A police officer assigned to the school fired at the shooter and arrested him. Shooter commit suicide while in detention facility.
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Ongoing fight relating to both bullying and gangs
column19: Shooter had been beat up by victim multiple times resulting in the shooter dropping out of school because of fear of the victim. Victim was involved with gang activity. Victim approached the shooter in the school parking lot and shooter fired handgun killing victim then fled the scene. The shooter was small for 17 YOM (5'7"  130 lbs). Shooter had no history of violence or disciplinary issues.

column16: Female student shot herself in bathroom
column19: 13YOF student excused herself from class  went to her locker to get a .22 handgun  and killed herself in the bathroom.

column16: Held class hostage  recent change in medication
column19: 16YOM held english class hostage for 45 minutes with a loaded hunting rifle. Shooter was talking about suicide and killing everyone. Shooter was on antidepressants and medication had been recently changed. Surrendered to principal without firing any shots. Shooter was popular student and athlete. Incident resulted in federal probe of the medications he was taking.

column16: Student fired 5 shots that missed  students were able to block doors until police arrived
column19: 14YOM had been expelled from other high school and sent to alternative school for troubled youths. Principal heard gun dry fire and saw 14 YOM shooter trying to load handgun. Principal was able to get students inside the school and block the door. The shooter fired shots into the windows but missed students. Shooter gained entry through another door and fired shots that missed janitor. Police were able to subdue the shooter when he attempted to reload. School had metal detectors at the door.

column16: Janitor shot outside of school  no suspects
column19: 33YOM janitor was shot in the parking lot at 11pm after finishing work. No suspect was identified or motive determined.

column16: Held class hostage  shot TV  and then shot self
column19: 16YOM pulled gun out of backpack and took class hostage. Released all hostages except for the teacher and a female student. Shooter fired at the TV and then shot himself in the head. Other students reported the shooter talked about guns and had a strong romantic interest in a girl who was not interested in him. Shooter had no prior disciplinary issues. Father and grandfather worked for school board.

column16: Officer killed during training drill at school
column19: Police officer was killed by a real round rather than a training round during a drill at the school.

column16: Police officer shot by teen in school
column19: Police officer tried to stop 2 teens in the hallway of the school. One pulled a gun and shot him then fled the scene. School was locked down for 6 hours but the suspects were not found.

column16: Fight between parents escalated into shooting in front of students
column19: Fight between parents in the parking lot as school was dismissing. 30YOF shot 29 YOF in the neck.

column16: Ongoing fight related to neighborhood dispute between students
column19: 16YOM fired two shots at a 17YOM student during a fight at lunch. Police said the shooting was related to an Ongoing "neighborhood dispute".

column16: Commit suicide in hallway
column19: 17YOM student shot himself once in the hallway while classes were being held. No witnesses. School as locked down.

column16: Gun fell out of backpack  fired  and struck student
column19: 18YOM had a gun in his backpack. It fell out and fired striking another student. 75 students were present in the outdoor quad of the school and thought a cherry bomb had gone off. 45 minutes later it was determined a gun had gone off. Student went to the nurses office and requested treatment for pain. Taken to hospital and doctors found that he had been shot and his lung was punctured.

column16: Student tossing jacket back and forth  gun in pocket discharged
column19: Students engaged in horseplay were throwing a jacket back and forth. A gun in the pocket discharged striking a student in the leg.

column16: Upset about break-up  looking for girlfriend  took other student and teacher hostage  commit suicide
column19: 17YOM former student (expelled) was upset about breakup with girlfriend 2 days prior. He went to school looking for her but she wasn't there. Had a .22 rifle and shotgun. In the science classroom he took a 15 YOF student and the teacher hostage for almost 3 hours before shooting himself when police entered. Principal said he did not believe the student was violent or worry about him when he was expelled. Weapons: 20-gauge shotgun  .22 rifle
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Teacher fired gun in classroom at 6:00  reported shots were fired at her class room at 9:12 AM
column19: 54YOF teacher fired a single gunshot inside her classroom at 6:00 AM. At 9:12 AM she reported her classroom was shot at leading to an extended lockdown of the school. Three months later she was charged with discharging the firearm on school property and a shell casing matching a gun she owned was found in the classroom. Motive is unclear.

column16: Made threats about school shooting  suspended  took principal hostage next day
column19: 18YOM student made threats to teacher and said "this will be another Pearl" in reference to a 1997 school shooting in Mississippi that injured 7. Student was suspended for the comment and escorted off the campus by the principal. The next day  the student came to the school with a gun and held the principal and assistant principal hostage for 4 hours before surrendering.

column2: Martin Luther King  Jr. High School
column16: Two boys teased a girl and pulled a bandana (gang colors) off her head; shot by her boyfriend
column19: Shooter fired 2 shots from .380 handgun at two other students as part of Ongoing dispute. The victims had made fun of the shooters girlfriend and taken his bandana. School had metal detectors and armed guards.

column16: Bus driver with rifle kidnapped 13 students and drove them 150 miles to area near Washington  DC
column19: 63 YOM bus driver with semi auto rifle kidnapped 13 students and drove them 150 miles from their school to Landover  MD. Bus driver surrendered to a security guard at a family dollar store. Bus driver had recently stopped taking drugs to control schizophrenia and had become obsessed with the 9/11 attacks.

column16: Man having affair with basketball coach's wife  attacked them in school parking lot
column19: 39YOM basketball coach shot wife and assistant coach (having an affair with his wife) in the parking lot of the school.

column16: Botched robbery in school hallway
column19: Three teenagers attempted to rob 2 students near the bathroom in the school hallway. When the male student refused to give his money  one of the three teens pulled a gun and fired multiple shot hitting both of them. The three suspects fled and were not identified. The school was locked down.

column16: Fired during a fist fight striking 2 students who were not involved
column19: 15YOM started firing during a fist fight outside of the school. A 21 YOM was also charged in connection with the fight. 2 uninvolved students were struck in the crossfire.

column16: Student had list of 8 teachers to kill and 50 rounds of ammo  surrendered to police officer
column19: 13YOM student walked into classroom with 35 students present and pointed gun at the teacher. She fled into the hallway and went to get help. The shooter surrendered a short time later to a police officer. Shooter had a list of 8 teacher's names and 50 rounds of ammo. Shooter had no prior problems or documented issues at the school. No shots fired.

column16: Officer shot teen behind the school
column19: Office approached two teens behind the school late at night. During a struggle  14YOM was fatally shot in the head  second teen fled the area.

column16: Armed security guards playing quick draw game  gun went off killing one
column19: Two security guards were outside of school dance. They were playing a quick draw game with their guns. One guard pulled his gun and the other karate kicked it out of his hand causing it to fire (struck in the chest and died).

column16: Shot herself in the school parking lot in front of other students
column19: 13YOF student shot herself in the school parking lot in front of other students. She was being treated for depression and had be admitted to psychiatric hospital. Previous suicide attempts.

column16: Gang related shooting in parking lot
column19: Shooter pulled into school parking lot at approximately 3:30PM and yelled something at the two victims prior to shooting a small caliber handgun in their direction. The victims were attempting to jump start their car at the time - no one was injured  but students were in the area which caused the suspect to be charged with additional crimes. It was later deemed to be a gang related shooting based on the victims having beaten up the shooter's younger brother on a prior occasion.

column16: Serial Sniper Victim
column19: Student shot outside of school by serial sniper who killed 17 random victims

column16: Shots fired during fight in school hallway
column19: One shot was fired during a physical altercation between two students in the hallway of the school prior to classes starting. Shooter fled the scene. School had metal detectors and armed guards. Two fatal shootings near the school during the same time period related to gang activity.

column16: Shot wife and son in school parking lot
column19: 43YOM shot at wife and son in school parking lot then fled the scene.

column16: Multiple shots fired by unknown person on the school grounds  2 struck
column19: Multiple shots were fired by someone on the school grounds during an after school event. A 12YOM student and a 21YOM standing across the street were both shot (no relation). No shooter was identified.

column16: Former student with shotgun forced students into cafeteria  splashed gasoline  wanted to light school on fire
column19: 18YOM former student who was expelled for stealing a car  walked into the school with a shotgun looking for the principal. When the shooter was told the principal no longer worked there  he splashed gasoline in the halls and forced students into the cafeteria where he splashed gasoline around them. When he attempted to light the gas on fire  he was tackled by school officials and students. Subdued until police arrived. Following his arrest  the shooter claimed to have left bombs at two other school but no explosive devices were found.

column16: Accidental discharge  shot self
column19: Shooter accidently shot himself in leg

column16: Shot at school window from across the street then shot self
column19: 13 YOM fired rifle at school window (broken glass injured two students inside). Shooter then fired and killed himself.

column16: Shooting outside school following prior altercation
column19: 18YOM student was killed protecting his 17YOF student sister during a confrontation outside of the school following a prior altercation with a 17YOM earlier that day in the school.

column16: Took student hostage  walked him down hallway  surrendered to SRO
column19: 12YOM walked into classroom and told male student to come out to the hallway. He held him hostage at gunpoint and walked down the hallway. Shooter was confronted by SRO and surrended a few minutes later to SRO and other police officers. Motive is unclear. Shooter had handgun and knife.

column16: Student climbed on roof  threatened to shoot himself  surrendered to police after 2 hours
column19: 17YOM student climbed on top of school roof with handgun and threatened to kill himself. Student pointed the gun at himself and police officers during the standoff. Student was upset about recent death of father. Surrendered to police officers after 2 hours.

column16: Shots fired during fight  missed target  shooter fled
column19: 14YOM fired 4 shots during fight with another 14YOm student. All shots missed and the shooter fled but was chased by a police officer and arrested a few blocks from the school.

column16: Talked with principal  pulled out gun  and shot himself in office
column19: 17YOM student was talking with the principal in his office about his problems. Student said the principal couldn't help and pulled out rifle from under jacket. Shot himself. Transported to the hospital and survived.

column16: Student shot self in bathroom
column19: 15YOM student shot himself in the bathroom of the school. His body was found by another student. Shooter had been depressed since his aunt had recently shot and killed his uncle.

column16: Man shot during gang dispute because of belt color
column19: 20YOM shot 30YOM in the head during a gang related dispute outside of the school. The victims had the belt color of a rival gang.

column16: Gang-related fight in hallway between students
column19: 15YOM student shot 16YOM student in the leg during a fight in the hallway. Students were members of rival gangs.

column16: Gang members targeted rival gang member in school gym
column19: Three shooters snuck handguns and an AK47 passed metal detectors and armed school guards then opened first on rival gang members in the school gym. Shooter fled the scene after the shooting. Two female students were hit in the crossfire. Victim was targeted. Students and school officials said the shooting was gang related. Weapons: AK-47-style semi automatic rifle  semi automatic handgun
column27: Tyrone Crump  Herbert Everett  Michelle Fulton

column16: Showing off gun  struck friend in stomach
column19: 18YOM student was showing off gun to 18YOM classmate. Discharged and struck him in stomach. Shooter fled the scene and was turned into police later by mother.

column16: Student shot herself in bathroom
column19: 12YOF student shot herself in the school bathroom

column2: Red Lion Area Junior High School
column16: Recently disciplined by principal
column19: Students were gathered in cafeteria before the school day. Shooter stood up and fired two close range shots at the principal and then immediately put the gun to his own head and commit suicide. 700 rounds of ammo in backpack and 3 handguns. Good student. Described as quiet and socially isolated. Recent break-up with girlfriend. Recently disciplined by principal for minor issue. No indication of prior planning or statements to other students. No suicide note. Psychologist believed he pulled the gun to show off and it went off by accident. He then killed himself in a panic. Weapons: .44 caliber .22 caliber .357 caliber

column16: Commit suicide in parking lot
column19: 18YOM student commit suicide in parking lot.

column16: Brought duffel bag with 7 weapons  shot self in bathroom
column19: 13YOM brought duffel bag with 7 guns (3 rifles  2 shotguns  2 handguns)  dressed in camo  and hundreds of rounds of ammo to school. Went to school bathroom. Reported he was going to supply three other students with weapons but they backed out at the last second and said they were going to call the police. Police were alerted for a report of a student with weapons in the bathroom. 10 minutes later  the shooter commit suicide when police approached the bathroom.
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Ongoing feud resulted in shooting at school stadium
column19: 20YOM shot 20YOM outside of the school stadium as a result of an ongoing dispute. Unclear if either were related to the school. Students were in the area at the time of the shooting. Building was locked down.

column16: Fired shot in bathroom  surrendered to teacher who investigated
column19: 13YOM fired a .44 revolver in the bathroom of the school. A teacher went to investigate the sound of the gun shot and found the shooter sitting on the floor. The shooter peacefully went with the teacher to the principal's office. Shooter was reported to have psychological problems and possible attempted suicide.

column16: Shot a specific victim during dismissal  missed hitting other student and police officer
column19: 14YOM fired at the crowd leaving the high school aiming for an intended target (possible rival gang members). Bullet struck a bystander student and a school police officer. Shooter fled the scene and was detained a few block away.

column16: Took 3 students hostage in classroom for an hour  shot by police
column19: 17YOM walked into classroom during lunch and pulled gun. Told teacher to leave and fired shot at her. Blocked door and held 3 students hostage. Discharged fire extinguisher. Shot by police officers when he climbed on top of a bookcase. Father reported the shooter was hearing voices and on pain medication. Recently watched the movie "Phone Booth" about a hostage standoff.

column16: Targeted two bullies  other students in area were not shot at
column19: Shooter had been bullied by victim. Shooter snuck gun past metal detectors and ambushed the victim when he came out of the locker room. Shooter fired multiple rounds  one missed and struck another student in the throat killing him. Victim ran from the shooter and the shooter chased him  eventually catching him and firing multiple shots to kill him. School officials found the shooter with an empty weapon and detained him until law enforcement arrived. Shooter had schizophrenia and described an imaginary friend who wore a black trench coat and told him to plan the shooting.

column16: Pulled gun in hallway  fired two shots into ceiling  tackled by SRO
column19: 13YOM called out girls name in hallway  pulled pistol  fired two shots in the air  and then was tackled by a sheriff's deputy working in the school. The shooter fought the deputy for the gun but he was able to detain him.

column16: Suicide by cop  depressed over breakup
column19: 18YOM brought duffel bag with shotgun  fake pistol  and baseball bat into classroom. Told the students and teacher to leave. Principal entered classroom and tried to talk him down. When police arrived  shooter walked outside to confront them. Principal tried to wrestle away shotgun when he pointed it at officers. Shooter was shot by police and principal was hit in leg by round (unclear if it was shooter or from police officer).

column16: Argument over car being broken into  third student shot at two arguing
column19: Two students were arguing over a car being broken into in the parking lot. Shooter was friends with one of the students and opened fire severely injuring a 17YOM student.

column16: Pulled gun  took teachers car keys  kidnapped other student  drove car in police chase
column19: 14YOM pulled handgun in classroom and forced teacher to give him car keys. Pointed gun at 12YOM student and took him hostage. Took student to parking lot  got in vehicle  and involved in 14 mile police chase. Shooter surrendered when police blocked highway. No injuries.

column16: Gang related shooting  two bystander students struck
column19: Gang related shooting outside of homecoming dance. Two bystander students were struck. Unknown teenage shooter fled the scene.

column16: Fight between large group of males following football game  uninvolved female student was shot and killed
column19: 21YOM fired shot during large fight after football game striking 17YOF student in the head. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested.

column16: Accidental discharge in students pocket
column19: Handgun in a 15YOM students pocket discharged grazing two other students.

column16: Suspect stopped by police on school playground - refused to drop gun - was shot.
column19: Police officer shot and killed a man who pointed a revolver at the officer on the field of the school.

column16: Fight outside school gym  shot fired striking uninvolved female student
column19: Single shot fired during large fight between multiple students. Female student was struck. First believed she was punched and it was later determined that she had been shot in the nose.

column16: Shooting in parking lot after basketball game during argument that started in gym
column19: 17YOM shot 33YOM football coach in the parking lot following an argument they had during a basketball game. Shooter fled but was quickly arrested by a police officer assigned to the school.

column16: Shot fired in bathroom by unknown shooter  gun found in stall  no suspect
column19: Students and teacher heard gunshot. School was locked down. Police found a .38 revolver that had been fired in a bathroom. No suspect identified.

column16: Drive-by in school parking lot  Ongoing dispute with target
column19: Shooter and 2 others in a vehicle fired +20 rounds from a Tec-9 machine gun at a 18YOM in a vehicle with 3 of people in the school parking lot. A basketball game had recently ended but police said the shooting was not related to it. The shooter had an ongoing dispute with the target. The shooter fled the scene in the vehicle and was later arrested.

column16: Shooting between rival gangs in school parking lot
column19: Shooter fired 15 shots at rival gang members in car parked in the school parking lot killing one and injuring one. Shooter then shot himself to make it appear that it was self defense and had his brother drive him to the hospital.

column16: Students passing .22 pistol  went off  female student shot but didn't notice pain until later  teacher thought it was firecracker
column19: Two 17YOM students were passing a .22 pistol in the classroom. The gun went off striking a 16YOF student. She did not immediately realize she had been struck  later determined the bullet was 2" from her heart. Teacher thought a firecracker went off. Wasn't determined to be a shooting until later. Student holding the gun was arrested later.

column16: Domestic  shooter killed man in parking lot and went into school looking for ex-girlfriend (teacher); took her hostage; confronted by police officer and killed
column19: Shooter had troubled relationship with an ex-girlfriend who was a teacher at the school. Shooter killed an adult male in the parking lot (likely her new boyfriend) and went into the school. Shooter took the ex-girlfriend hostage for 20 minutes before walking her out to the parking lot where he was shot and killed by a police officer investigating the shooting. Students were in the school during the incident but were not harmed.

column16: Multiple fights between shooter and victim
column19: Ongoing dispute between two students had resulted in multiple fist fights. During a fist fight  the shooter pulled a handgun and fired multiple shots killing the victim. The school and the parents were both aware the fights and had attempted resolution.

column16: Showed off gun  fired when he put it into waistband of pants striking himself
column19: 12YOM student was showing off gun to other students in the classroom. Fired when he put it back into the waistband of his pants.

column16: Police officer fired at student in vehicle in parking lot
column19: Student had been involved in fight with other students. He drove a stolen car into a staff only parking lot. Officer fear his life was in danger at fired at the student in the vehicle. Shots missed and no one was injured.

column16: Planned attack  sent texts warning others  tackled after first shot
column19: 16YOM went into bathroom and sent text message to girl warning her to get out of school. Had been talking about school shooting for past two week including watching "Bowling for Columbine". Wore black trench coat. Walked out of bathroom with shotgun and fired at a student but missed. Tackled by the asst principal. Fired again striking another teacher in the leg before being subdued. Shooter was considered a good student and did not have disciplinary issues. Described as shy by classmates. Told other students about his plans to shoot up the school.

column16: Shootout between drug deals  student and teacher hit in cross fire
column19: Two drug dealers in a feud over territory fired 90 shots at each other striking a student and teacher on the playground of the elementary school. Both were later arrested. Weapons: carbine rifle  assault weapon
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Student shot during carjacking in parking lot
column19: 17YOM student shot during attempted carjacking in the school parking lot. Shot fled into school and changed clothes in locker room. Gun was not recovered.

column16: Teacher shot by fiance  he fled and shot himself 30 minutes later
column19: 41YOM shot and killed his 19YOF fiance who was a teacher at the k-12 Christian school. Fled the scene and killed himself 30 minutes later. Shooter was a reserve police officer.

column2: Saledad Enrichment Action Charter High School
column16: Gang related drive by shooting
column19: 20 students were standing in front of the school when shot were fired from a vehicle striking a 17YOM and 16YOM student. Police believed the male student shot was targeted due to gang affiliation.

column16: Shot self in class infront of teacher and 18 students
column19: 13YOM student carried gun into class in guitar case. At end of class  he took the gun out and shot himself in the chest.

column16: Multiple shots fired outside of school  no injuries
column19: Unknown teen fired multiple shots outside of the school and then fled. No students were injured but school was locked down for 3.5 hours.

column16: Fight after basketball game
column19: Rival groups of students had multiple fights during the week leading up to a charity basketball game. After the basketball game  a fist fight started and escalated into a shooting. The shooter fired multiple shots into the crowd injuring multiple uninvolved students. School administrators were aware of the brewing violence between the groups and had attempted to de-escalate them during the week.
column27: Matthew Timothy McCullough  Tyrone Devon Brown

column16: Gang related shooting outside of school  bystander female student struck
column19: 19YOM was shot during confrontation with 3 gang members. Female student was also struck. All three gang members fled and were arrested.

column16: Murder suicide of husband killing wife (cafeteria worker)
column19: 52YOM shot and killed his 39YOF estranged wife in the parking lot at 6:00 AM. She worked in the cafeteria. No students were present. Shooter immediately commit suicide after shooting her.

column16: Gang-related drive-by in retaliation for prior fight
column19: Group of students outside of school flashed gang signs and threw bottles at a passing car. The car stopped and fired multiple shot striking two students then fled the area. Police said the shooting was gang related.

column16: Band member shot fellow band member during break
column19: 16YOM was shot in the shoulder by a fellow band member. The shooting took place on one of the school's parking lots around 8:45 a.m. Police took the unnamed shooter in to custody shortly after the shooting and charged him with attempted murder.

column16: Shot fired during fight in classroom
column19: 17YOM tried to stop a fight between group. 16YOM pulled a handgun and fired a shot at 17YOM. Shot hit the classroom door and no one was injured.

column16: Argument in parking lot while victim was waiting to pick up brother  shot in chest
column19: 22YOM shot while waiting to pick up brother at school. Had argument with another man and was shot in chest. Police said the shooting was gang related.

column16: Adult female shot student when he became aggressive and reached for gun
column19: 34YOF (unknown relationship) saw a 16YOM student smoking marijuana at noon behind the school. She approached him and he became belligerent and aggressive. He pushed her away and reached under his shirt for a weapon. Female drew her .38-caliber revolver and shot the boy in the foot.

column16: Fired shot into school ceiling during fight between 2 groups of students
column19: 16YOM fired handgun into the ceiling during fight between two groups of students then fled the area.

column16: Shooter called ex-girlfriend  current boyfriend and friends came to school to confront him
column19: Early morning fight on the school grounds. Shooter had called his ex-girlfriend angering current boyfriend. They all met at the school parking lot in the morning. Shooter fired 3 shots and drove away. Later arrested. Shooter was using methamphetamine at the time.

column16: Attempted to get into ex-girlfriend's house  fired 2 shots into air  walked to high school and shot himself
column19: 15YOM was upset about breakup. Went to ex-girlfriend's house with shotgun but parents would not let him inside. He fired two shots into the air. Walked to high school and shot himself on the steps.

column16: Two men fatally shot each other in dispute over woman
column19: Two 25YOM shot each other in the school parking lot during a domestic dispute over a woman.

column16: Gang related shooting at football game
column19: 19YOM shot at 17YOM during football game. Police said the shooting was gang related. Shooter fled in a vehicle after shooting.

column16: Fight over girl  two random students were shot
column19: Fight over girl in the school courtyard. 16YOM student fired shots striking two students who were not involved and fled.

column16: Killed by unknown shooter in parking lot  believed to be gang related
column19: 32YOM found shot dead in the school parking lot. Witnesses reported seeing a car leaving the area but no other info about the shooting. Police believe the shooting is gang related.

column16: Argument between two men  mother picking up child shot in crossfire
column19: Parent shot picking child up from school. Men in two different vehicles fired at each other as part of ongoing dispute.
column27: Charles B Kidd Jr  Eugene F Anderson

column16: Shot later after slapping woman
column19: After the basketball game with Ensley High School had wrapped up around 9:00  a female told a group of males that a man had slapped her across her face. She told the group of males that her attacker was a 20YOM.  As Antwin left the gym  the group of males drove by and shot him in the abdomen. Police arrested 20-year-old Obray Carter at the school and charged him with attempted murder.

column16: Argument during basketball game
column19: Argument between 20YOM shooter and 19YOM victim escalated into shooting during basketball game. Shooter fired 2 shots and fled the area.

column16: Fired gun in bathroom  ran into class with gun  arrested by police
column19: 14YOM fired gun in bathroom  ran into a classroom  and was arrested by police.

column16: 4 students playing with gun in car  one shot in leg  claimed a driveby
column19: 4 students were playing with a gun in the car  accidentally fired striking one of the students. Called 911 and told police they had been in a drive by shooting.

column16: Shot himself in front of school  reported he had fireworks and multiple types of ammo
column19: 16YOM student shot and killed himself in front of school. Reported that he had fireworks and multiple types of ammo in his backpack. Online blog had violent imagery and references to shooting and bombing school. Teachers and students said he was a good kid and varsity athlete. Students reported he had been teased for being queer.

column16: Shot in parking lot by masked gunman
column19: 18YOM shot in the school parking lot inside his car by a masked gunman. No other information available.

column16: Cafeteria worker shot coworker and then killed himself
column19: Cafeteria worker shot coworker 3 times and then shot himself. Motive unclear.

column16: Killed by rival gang member outside of school
column19: 18YOM student waiting outside of high school was shot and killed by rival gang member. 4 teens from a rival gang were involved in the shooting and fled together. Group of teens involved attempted to intimidate witnesses following the shooting.

column16: Two non-students shot after entering school
column19: While the students were leaving the building for first dismissal  two non-students entered the building via a side door that students opened up for them. Unclear who fired shots and one of the non-students was shot.  Pepper spray was also discharged.  The wounded individual was taken to the hospital for treatment. Unknown shooter fled the scene.

column16: Fired shots at another student in hallway  prior fight with shot fired away from school
column19: 15YOM fired 3 shots in the hallway at another student he had an ongoing conflict and prior gun battle with. All of the shots missed. Shooter fled the scene. Shooter was arrested at a relatives house. The gun used was linked to an unsolved homicide in the area.

column16: Gun was dropped and discharged
column19: 15YOF (sister) and 19YOM (brother) were on school grounds. Brother was holding gun  the gun dropped  and it discharged a bullet into Angela's neck.

column16: Fight as school dismissed
column19: Student was shot in the leg (caught in the crossfire) during a fight between multiple students when the school was dismissing.

column16: Killed bus driver because she had reported his tobacco use
column19: Shooter fired multiple shots killing the bus driver while the bus was on the way to school. The bus crashed into a utility pole but nobody was injured. The bus driver had reported the shooter for chewing tobacco on the bus. Shooter was a good student and had no history of violence. Shooter reported he was depressed  suicidal  and hearing voices at the time of the shooting.

column16: Shots fired during argument between expelled student (shooter) and other students
column19: 16YOM shooter had been expelled from school. In the parking lot  he had a confrontation with 3 other students that resulted in a shooting.

column16: Drive-by when people were leaving meeting at school
column19: After a meeting at the school  the participants filed out onto the grounds and into the parking lot to their vehicles.  As they mingled  a car pulled up on the street and the driver stuck his arm out the window with a handgun and opened fire on one of the groups. A Dallas City Parks and Recreation Department employee was grazed in the leg leg.

column16: Student showing off gun in classroom shot himself in hand
column19: 7YOM was showing off gun in classroom and shot himself in the hand putting it into his backpack.

column16: Drive-by in retaliation for prior shooting
column19: Three males (17  21  22) fired an AK47 at a vehicle in the school parking lot occupied by 3 students. Shooting was related to a prior shooting between the groups of males. One student was killed and two were injured. Shooter fled and were later arrested. During the trail  a key witness was murdered. Unclear if gangs are involved.

column16: Victim accidentally caught in cross fire of gang related shooting
column19: Victim was accidently stuck by a bullet fired from 18 shooter who was involved in a gang related shooting. Shooter later arrested and charged. Victim died 8 days later.

column16: Bystand student struck when shots were fired during fight
column19: Victim caught in the crossfire of an ongoing dispute. Unidentified shooter fled and gun was not recovered.

column16: Planned attack on school  studied Columbine  wore trench coat  had been bullied
column19: Shooter killed his grandfather who was a tribal police officer and took his department issued shotgun and handgun plus a ballistic vest to the school. Shooter fired in the hallway and a classroom killing and injuring multiple students. When shooter was engaged by law enforcement  he went into a classroom and commit suicide. The shooter was obsessed with Columbine and other mass shootings. School officials were aware of violent journal entries he wrote about mass shootings. He told other students about his plan to attack the school (one was arrested for conspiracy but charges were dropped). Shooter was bullied and dressed like the Columbine shooters wearing a black trenchcoat and dark makeup. Shooter's father had commit suicide and mother was severely injured in car accident; placed into custody of grandparents. Shooter was on increased dosage of prozac at the time of the shooting. Weapons: .40 caliber; 12-gauge
column26: Combination of Different Types of Weapons

column16: Accidental discharge in pocket during class
column19: Shooter was playing with gun in his pocket and accidentally fired shooting himself in the leg. The shooter told other students not to tell the teacher and tried to blend in with the crowd leaving the school. Shooter gave gun to a classmate to hide (also charged and expelled following the incident).

column16: Accidental discharge of gun in student's purse
column19: As 17YOF reached into her purse today  the loaded gun she had in there went off.  The bullet struck her in the arm.  She was transported to the Regional Medical Center for treatment of bullet wound and was charged as a juvenile for bringing a weapon onto school property.

column16: Accidental discharge in classroom
column19: Handgun being carried by a 17YOM accidentally went off. Shooter fled the classroom holding his leg  however  he only received a minor powder burn.

column16: Shot football coach for benching his son
column19: Father of football player was angry at coach for benching his son and had multiple violent arguments. 44YOM drove to the school  shot coach in the chest  and fled the scene.

column16: Student fired gun in pocket  students in the class fled the scene  threw gun in sewer drain
column19: 15YOM was playing with gun in pocket when it fired in classroom. Students fled the area. No injured. Student threw gun in sewer drain but it was found by school officials.

column16: Shot fired at window of the school office
column19: One of the bullets smashed a window and struck secretary Pat Smith.  She was taken to the hospital for treatment.  Police were able to recover a shell casing  and began looking for the shooter. Police identified a 17YOM as the shooter.

column16: Fight in high school parking lot following earlier fight broken up by police  shots fired
column19: Fight between two groups of students from different high schools at a skatepark. Police were called and broke it up. Both groups of students met later at the high school parking lot. Shots were fired injuring a 18YOM. 17YOM was later arrested.

column16: Student's mother was killed by ex-boyfriend in the parking lot then commit suicide
column19: While 32YOF (student's mother) was waiting to pick child up in the parking lot  she was shot and killed during a dispute with her ex-boyfriend (47YOM). He then commit suicide.

column16: Showing off airsoft gun in parking lot  accidentally fired injuring 2 students
column19: 19YOM was showing off airsoft pistol to two students in the parking lot. Gun discharged causing minor injuries to both. 19YOM was charged with aggravated battery.

column16: Student shot self in leg outside of school put pistol into pocket
column19: 16YOM student shot self in leg putting pistol into pocket outside of high school. Student left the gun outside during the day to avoid metal detectors. Student threw the gun over a fence after the shooting.

column2: Academia Ana Marie Sandoval Montessori School
column16: Unknown shooter fired BB gun at playground striking teacher in the neck
column19: Unknown gunman fired BB gun at school playground striking on teacher in the neck and another in the leg. Both teacher were transported to the hospital. No info on gunman or motive.

column16: Fired BB gun at students during drive-by
column19: 17YOM opened fire on his classmates with a BB gun while he was in a moving vehicle.  Two students received minor wounds from the flying pellets and were taken to Vassar Hospital for treatment.  Jeremy was arrested and charged with criminal possession of a weapon  felony attempted assault  two counts of felony assault and two misdemeanor charges for reckless endangerment.  He bonded out of jail with $10 000 and his court date was scheduled for June 21  2005 at 3:00.

column16: 3 shot during fight between 20 people at school
column19: Three males shot during fight between 20 males outside of school. Fight occured on a Sunday evening and appears unrelated to the school.

column16: Police tried to break up fight between female students  brother fired at officers killing one
column19: Two female students were fighting in the parking lot. When police arrived to break up the fight  male students tried to stop them. Shots were fired striking both officers (one fatally). The injured officer was able to return fire striking the shooter who ran away. Shooter and multiple others were arrested in connection with the officer's death.

column16: School maintenance worker shot while in school maintenance shop by two masked men
column19: School maintenance worker was shot when two masked gunmen ran into the maintenance shop at approximately 7:30am and shot the worker - suspects fled - believed to related to victim had evidence against someone.

column16: Shot during argument outside of school
column19: 15YOM walking with 2 other teens outside of school was shot and killed during dispute with 26YOM shooter in vehicle. Shooter fled the scene and was later arrested.

column16: 2 males shot in school parking lot by unknown shooter
column19: Unknown shooter fired at a group of students and non-students in the parking lot. 18YOM and 21YOM were injured. Shooter fled.

column16: Three students were handling weapon when it accidentally fired striking victim; plotting to kill teacher
column19: Three students were handling a handgun in the boys bathroom when it went off striking another student in the leg - it was later revealed the students had plotted to kill a teacher who earlier disciplined one of the boys.

column16: Shots during fight in parking lot
column19: Two students were fighting over a girl in the school parking lot. A third student fired multiple shot at them but all of the shots missed. 15YOM arrested the next day.

column16: Shooting stemmed from misunderstanding over a girl
column19: Victim was shot in stomach during early dismissal. Shooter - 21 year old non student shot victim due to girl

column16: Fight involving multiple students at end of day
column19: Fight occured at the end of the school day between multiple students. During the fight  the shooter fired a .25 handgun striking another student in the foot. A police officer assigned to the school immediately arrested the shooter.

column16: Drive-by shooting. Possible feud or gang escalation
column19: Drive-by shooting when hundreds of students left homecoming dance. 15YOM shot in leg and 14YOF shot in shoulder.

column16: Fired shot into ceiling then surrendered to school administrator
column19: 17YOM dressed all in black with mask and took disassembled shotgun in bag into bathroom. When shooter put the gun together  other students told him that they didn't believe it was a real gun. Shooter fired into the ceiling and students fled. School principal heard the shot  ran to the bathroom  and ordered shooter to surrender. The shooter put down the gun and the principal subdued him. Principal said the shooter has multiple mental health issues and believed the incident was an attempted suicide or cry for help but other students were not in danger.

column16: Student shot during fight with 6 other students
column19: 16YOM student was approached by a group of 6 students outside of the school. During the fight  he was shot in the leg and the group of teens fled. Police said it was not related to gang activity.

column16: Student shot in school parking lot as part of Ongoing conflict
column19: 16YOM was shot in the parking lot by a 17YOM who got out of vehicle and then fled in the same vehicle. Shooter and the victim knew each other and had Ongoing dispute.
